;;;1105   uint16_t LCD_Blend565(uint16_t src, uint16_t dst, uint8_t alpha)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1106   {
000002  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;1107   	uint32_t src2;
;;;1108   	uint32_t dst2;
;;;1109   
;;;1110   	src2 = ((src << 16) |src) & 0x07E0F81F;
000004  ea434003          ORR      r0,r3,r3,LSL #16
000008  4e08              LDR      r6,|L1.44|
00000a  ea000406          AND      r4,r0,r6
;;;1111   	dst2 = ((dst << 16) | dst) & 0x07E0F81F;
00000e  ea414001          ORR      r0,r1,r1,LSL #16
000012  ea000506          AND      r5,r0,r6
;;;1112   	dst2 = ((((dst2 - src2) * alpha) >> 5) + src2) & 0x07E0F81F;
000016  1b28              SUBS     r0,r5,r4
000018  4350              MULS     r0,r2,r0
00001a  eb041050          ADD      r0,r4,r0,LSR #5
00001e  ea000506          AND      r5,r0,r6
;;;1113   	return (dst2 >> 16) | dst2;
000022  ea454015          ORR      r0,r5,r5,LSR #16
000026  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
;;;1114   }
000028  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1115

                  LCD_DispControl PROC
;;;1631   */
;;;1632   void LCD_DispControl(void *_pControl)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1633   {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1634   	uint8_t id;
;;;1635   
;;;1636   	id = *(uint8_t *)_pControl;	/* 读取ID */
000004  7825              LDRB     r5,[r4,#0]
;;;1637   
;;;1638   	switch (id)
000006  2d08              CMP      r5,#8
000008  d21e              BCS      |L6.72|
00000a  e8dff005          TBB      [pc,r5]
00000e  1d04              DCB      0x1d,0x04
000010  05090d11          DCB      0x05,0x09,0x0d,0x11
000014  1519              DCB      0x15,0x19
;;;1639   	{
;;;1640   		case ID_ICON:
;;;1641   			//void LCD_DrawIcon(const ICON_T *_tIcon, FONT_T *_tFont, uint8_t _ucFocusMode);
;;;1642   			break;
000016  e017              B        |L6.72|
;;;1643   
;;;1644   		case ID_WIN:
;;;1645   			LCD_DrawWin((WIN_T *)_pControl);
000018  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawWin
;;;1646   			break;
00001e  e013              B        |L6.72|
;;;1647   
;;;1648   		case ID_LABEL:
;;;1649   			LCD_DrawLabel((LABEL_T *)_pControl);
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLabel
;;;1650   			break;
000026  e00f              B        |L6.72|
;;;1651   
;;;1652   		case ID_BUTTON:
;;;1653   			LCD_DrawButton((BUTTON_T *)_pControl);
000028  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;1654   			break;
00002e  e00b              B        |L6.72|
;;;1655   
;;;1656   		case ID_CHECK:
;;;1657   			LCD_DrawCheckBox((CHECK_T *)_pControl);
000030  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000032  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawCheckBox
;;;1658   			break;
000036  e007              B        |L6.72|
;;;1659   
;;;1660   		case ID_EDIT:
;;;1661   			LCD_DrawEdit((EDIT_T *)_pControl);
000038  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawEdit
;;;1662   			break;
00003e  e003              B        |L6.72|
;;;1663   
;;;1664   		case ID_GROUP:
;;;1665   			LCD_DrawGroupBox((GROUP_T *)_pControl);
000040  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000042  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawGroupBox
;;;1666   			break;
000046  bf00              NOP      
                  |L6.72|
000048  bf00              NOP                            ;1642
;;;1667   	}
;;;1668   }
00004a  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1669   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DispOff||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DispOff PROC
;;;196    */
;;;197    void LCD_DispOff(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;198    {
;;;199    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
000002  4809              LDR      r0,|L7.40|
000004  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000006  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000008  d102              BNE      |L7.16|
;;;200    	{
;;;201    		RA8875_DispOff();
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DispOff
00000e  e00a              B        |L7.38|
                  |L7.16|
;;;202    	}
;;;203    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
000010  4805              LDR      r0,|L7.40|
000012  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000014  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
000018  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
00001a  d102              BNE      |L7.34|
;;;204    	{
;;;205    		ILI9488_DispOff();
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_DispOff
000020  e001              B        |L7.38|
                  |L7.34|
;;;206    	}
;;;207    	else	/* 61509, 5420, 4001 */
;;;208    	{
;;;209    		SPFD5420_DispOff();
000022  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DispOff
                  |L7.38|
;;;210    	}
;;;211    }
000026  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;212    
                          ENDP

                  |L7.40|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DispOn||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DispOn PROC
;;;172    */
;;;173    void LCD_DispOn(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;174    {
;;;175    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
000002  4809              LDR      r0,|L8.40|
000004  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000006  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000008  d102              BNE      |L8.16|
;;;176    	{
;;;177    		RA8875_DispOn();
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DispOn
00000e  e00a              B        |L8.38|
                  |L8.16|
;;;178    	}
;;;179    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
000010  4805              LDR      r0,|L8.40|
000012  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000014  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
000018  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
00001a  d102              BNE      |L8.34|
;;;180    	{
;;;181    		ILI9488_DispOn();
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_DispOn
000020  e001              B        |L8.38|
                  |L8.34|
;;;182    	}
;;;183    	else	/* 61509, 5420, 4001 */
;;;184    	{
;;;185    		SPFD5420_DispOn();
000022  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DispOn
                  |L8.38|
;;;186    	}
;;;187    }
000026  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;188    
                          ENDP

                  |L8.40|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DispStr||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DispStr PROC
;;;248    */	uint8_t font_width,font_height;uint8_t width;uint16_t font_bytes;
;;;249    void LCD_DispStr(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, char *_ptr, FONT_T *_tFont)
000000  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;250    {
000004  f2ad4d9c          SUB      sp,sp,#0x49c
000008  4691              MOV      r9,r2
00000a  461d              MOV      r5,r3
;;;251    	uint32_t i;
;;;252    	uint8_t code1,t;
;;;253    	uint8_t code2;
;;;254    	uint32_t address = 0;
00000c  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;255    	uint8_t buf[96 * 96 / 8];	/* 最大支持24点阵汉字 */
;;;256    	
;;;257    	uint16_t m;
;;;258    
;;;259    	uint16_t x, y;
;;;260    	const uint8_t *pAscDot;
;;;261    
;;;262    #ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;263    	const uint8_t *pHzDot;
;;;264    #else
;;;265    	uint32_t AddrHZK;
;;;266    #endif
;;;267    
;;;268    	/* 如果字体结构为空指针，则缺省按16点阵 */
;;;269    	if (_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_12)
00000e  8828              LDRH     r0,[r5,#0]
000010  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000012  d10c              BNE      |L9.46|
;;;270    	{
;;;271    		font_height = 12;
000014  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
000016  4983              LDR      r1,|L9.548|
000018  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;272    		font_width = 12;
00001a  4983              LDR      r1,|L9.552|
00001c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;273    		font_bytes = 24;
00001e  2018              MOVS     r0,#0x18
000020  4982              LDR      r1,|L9.556|
000022  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;274    		pAscDot = g_Ascii12;
000024  f8df8208          LDR      r8,|L9.560|
;;;275    		t=2;
000028  2702              MOVS     r7,#2
;;;276    	#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;277    		pHzDot = g_Hz12;
00002a  4c82              LDR      r4,|L9.564|
00002c  e03d              B        |L9.170|
                  |L9.46|
;;;278    	#else
;;;279    		AddrHZK = HZK12_ADDR;
;;;280    	#endif
;;;281    	}
;;;282    	else if(_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_24)
00002e  8828              LDRH     r0,[r5,#0]
000030  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000032  d10c              BNE      |L9.78|
;;;283    	{
;;;284    		font_height = 24;
000034  2018              MOVS     r0,#0x18
000036  497b              LDR      r1,|L9.548|
000038  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;285    		font_width = 24;
00003a  497b              LDR      r1,|L9.552|
00003c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;286    		font_bytes = 72;
00003e  2048              MOVS     r0,#0x48
000040  497a              LDR      r1,|L9.556|
000042  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;287    		pAscDot = g_Ascii16;
000044  f8df81f0          LDR      r8,|L9.568|
;;;288    		t=3;
000048  2703              MOVS     r7,#3
;;;289    	#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;290    		pHzDot = g_Hz24;
00004a  4c7c              LDR      r4,|L9.572|
00004c  e02d              B        |L9.170|
                  |L9.78|
;;;291    	#else
;;;292    		AddrHZK = HZK12_ADDR;
;;;293    	#endif
;;;294    	}
;;;295    	else if(_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_48)
00004e  8828              LDRH     r0,[r5,#0]
000050  2803              CMP      r0,#3
000052  d10d              BNE      |L9.112|
;;;296    	{
;;;297    		font_height = 48;
000054  2030              MOVS     r0,#0x30
000056  4973              LDR      r1,|L9.548|
000058  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;298    		font_width = 48;
00005a  4973              LDR      r1,|L9.552|
00005c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;299    		font_bytes = 288;
00005e  f44f7090          MOV      r0,#0x120
000062  4972              LDR      r1,|L9.556|
000064  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;300    		pAscDot = g_Ascii16;
000066  f8df81d0          LDR      r8,|L9.568|
;;;301    		t=6;
00006a  2706              MOVS     r7,#6
;;;302    	#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;303    		pHzDot = g_Hz48;
00006c  4c74              LDR      r4,|L9.576|
00006e  e01c              B        |L9.170|
                  |L9.112|
;;;304    	#else
;;;305    		AddrHZK = HZK12_ADDR;
;;;306    	#endif
;;;307    	}
;;;308    	else if(_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_96)
000070  8828              LDRH     r0,[r5,#0]
000072  2804              CMP      r0,#4
000074  d10d              BNE      |L9.146|
;;;309    	{
;;;310    		font_height = 96;
000076  2060              MOVS     r0,#0x60
000078  496a              LDR      r1,|L9.548|
00007a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;311    		font_width = 96;
00007c  496a              LDR      r1,|L9.552|
00007e  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;312    		font_bytes = 1152;
000080  f44f6090          MOV      r0,#0x480
000084  4969              LDR      r1,|L9.556|
000086  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;313    		pAscDot = g_Ascii16;
000088  f8df81ac          LDR      r8,|L9.568|
;;;314    		t=12;
00008c  270c              MOVS     r7,#0xc
;;;315    	#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;316    		pHzDot = g_Hz96;
00008e  4c6d              LDR      r4,|L9.580|
000090  e00b              B        |L9.170|
                  |L9.146|
;;;317    	#else
;;;318    		AddrHZK = HZK12_ADDR;
;;;319    	#endif
;;;320    	}
;;;321    	else
;;;322    	{
;;;323    		/* 缺省是16点阵 */
;;;324    		font_height = 16;
000092  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000094  4963              LDR      r1,|L9.548|
000096  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;325    		font_width = 16;
000098  4963              LDR      r1,|L9.552|
00009a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;326    		font_bytes = 32;
00009c  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
00009e  4963              LDR      r1,|L9.556|
0000a0  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;327    		pAscDot = g_Ascii16;
0000a2  f8df8194          LDR      r8,|L9.568|
;;;328    		t=2;
0000a6  2702              MOVS     r7,#2
;;;329    	#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;330    		pHzDot = g_Hz16;
0000a8  4c67              LDR      r4,|L9.584|
                  |L9.170|
;;;331    	#else
;;;332    		AddrHZK = HZK16_ADDR;
;;;333    	#endif
;;;334    	}
;;;335    
;;;336    	/* 开始循环处理字符 */
;;;337    	while (*_ptr != 0)
0000aa  e0b1              B        |L9.528|
                  |L9.172|
;;;338    	{
;;;339    		code1 = *_ptr;	/* 读取字符串数据， 该数据可能是ascii代码，也可能汉字代码的高字节 */
0000ac  f8990000          LDRB     r0,[r9,#0]
0000b0  f8cd0498          STR      r0,[sp,#0x498]
;;;340    		if (code1 < 0x80)
0000b4  f8dd0498          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x498]
0000b8  2880              CMP      r0,#0x80
0000ba  da1b              BGE      |L9.244|
;;;341    		{
;;;342    			/* 将ascii字符点阵复制到buf */
;;;343    			memcpy(buf, &pAscDot[code1 * (font_bytes / 2)], (font_bytes / 2));
0000bc  485b              LDR      r0,|L9.556|
0000be  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; font_bytes
0000c0  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
0000c2  485a              LDR      r0,|L9.556|
0000c4  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; font_bytes
0000c6  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
0000c8  eb0070d0          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSR #31
0000cc  1043              ASRS     r3,r0,#1
0000ce  f8dd0498          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x498]
0000d2  fb008103          MLA      r1,r0,r3,r8
0000d6  9802              LDR      r0,[sp,#8]
0000d8  eb0070d0          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSR #31
0000dc  1042              ASRS     r2,r0,#1
0000de  a805              ADD      r0,sp,#0x14
0000e0  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;344    			width = font_width / 2;
0000e4  4950              LDR      r1,|L9.552|
0000e6  7808              LDRB     r0,[r1,#0]  ; font_width
0000e8  eb0071d0          ADD      r1,r0,r0,LSR #31
0000ec  1049              ASRS     r1,r1,#1
0000ee  4a57              LDR      r2,|L9.588|
0000f0  7011              STRB     r1,[r2,#0]
0000f2  e03c              B        |L9.366|
                  |L9.244|
;;;345    		}
;;;346    		else
;;;347    		{
;;;348    			code2 = *++_ptr;
0000f4  f1090001          ADD      r0,r9,#1
0000f8  4681              MOV      r9,r0
0000fa  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
0000fc  f8cd0494          STR      r0,[sp,#0x494]
;;;349    			if (code2 == 0)
000100  f8dd0494          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x494]
000104  b900              CBNZ     r0,|L9.264|
;;;350    			{
;;;351    				break;
000106  e088              B        |L9.538|
                  |L9.264|
;;;352    			}
;;;353    
;;;354    			/* 计算16点阵汉字点阵地址
;;;355    				ADDRESS = [(code1-0xa1) * 94 + (code2-0xa1)] * 32
;;;356    				;
;;;357    			*/
;;;358    			#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;359    				m = 0;
000108  f04f0a00          MOV      r10,#0
;;;360    				while(1)
00010c  e029              B        |L9.354|
                  |L9.270|
;;;361    				{
;;;362    					address = m * (font_bytes + 2);
00010e  4847              LDR      r0,|L9.556|
000110  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; font_bytes
000112  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2
000114  fb0af600          MUL      r6,r10,r0
;;;363    					m++;
000118  f10a0001          ADD      r0,r10,#1
00011c  fa1ffa80          UXTH     r10,r0
;;;364    					if ((code1 == pHzDot[address + 0]) && (code2 == pHzDot[address + 1]))
000120  5da1              LDRB     r1,[r4,r6]
000122  f8dd0498          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x498]
000126  4281              CMP      r1,r0
000128  d10d              BNE      |L9.326|
00012a  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1
00012c  5c21              LDRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00012e  f8dd0494          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x494]
000132  4281              CMP      r1,r0
000134  d107              BNE      |L9.326|
;;;365    					{
;;;366    						address += 2;
000136  1cb6              ADDS     r6,r6,#2
;;;367    						memcpy(buf, &pHzDot[address], font_bytes);
000138  19a1              ADDS     r1,r4,r6
00013a  483c              LDR      r0,|L9.556|
00013c  8802              LDRH     r2,[r0,#0]  ; font_bytes
00013e  a805              ADD      r0,sp,#0x14
000140  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;368    						break;
000144  e00e              B        |L9.356|
                  |L9.326|
;;;369    					}
;;;370    					else if ((pHzDot[address + 0] == 0xFF) && (pHzDot[address + 1] == 0xFF))
000146  5da0              LDRB     r0,[r4,r6]
000148  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00014a  d10a              BNE      |L9.354|
00014c  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1
00014e  5c20              LDRB     r0,[r4,r0]
000150  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000152  d106              BNE      |L9.354|
;;;371    					{
;;;372    						/* 字库搜索完毕，未找到，则填充全FF */
;;;373    						memset(buf, 0xFF, font_bytes);
000154  22ff              MOVS     r2,#0xff
000156  4835              LDR      r0,|L9.556|
000158  8801              LDRH     r1,[r0,#0]  ; font_bytes
00015a  a805              ADD      r0,sp,#0x14
00015c  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memset
;;;374    						break;
000160  e000              B        |L9.356|
                  |L9.354|
000162  e7d4              B        |L9.270|
                  |L9.356|
000164  bf00              NOP                            ;368
;;;375    					}
;;;376    				}
;;;377    			#else	/* 用全字库 */
;;;378    				/* 此处需要根据字库文件存放位置进行修改 */
;;;379    				if (code1 >=0xA1 && code1 <= 0xA9 && code2 >=0xA1)
;;;380    				{
;;;381    					address = ((code1 - 0xA1) * 94 + (code2 - 0xA1)) * font_bytes + AddrHZK;
;;;382    				}
;;;383    				else if (code1 >=0xB0 && code1 <= 0xF7 && code2 >=0xA1)
;;;384    				{
;;;385    					address = ((code1 - 0xB0) * 94 + (code2 - 0xA1) + 846) * font_bytes + AddrHZK;
;;;386    				}
;;;387    				memcpy(buf, (const uint8_t *)address, font_bytes);
;;;388    			#endif
;;;389    
;;;390    				width = font_width;
000166  4830              LDR      r0,|L9.552|
000168  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; font_width
00016a  4938              LDR      r1,|L9.588|
00016c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L9.366|
;;;391    		}
;;;392    
;;;393    		y = _usY;
00016e  f8dd04a0          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x4a0]
000172  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;394    		/* 开始刷LCD */
;;;395    		for (m = 0; m < font_height; m++)	/* 字符高度 */
000174  f04f0a00          MOV      r10,#0
000178  e03a              B        |L9.496|
                  |L9.378|
;;;396    		{
;;;397    			x = _usX;
00017a  f8dd049c          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x49c]
00017e  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;398    			for (i = 0; i < width; i++)	/* 字符宽度 */
000180  f04f0b00          MOV      r11,#0
000184  e028              B        |L9.472|
                  |L9.390|
;;;399    			{
;;;400    				if ((buf[m * ((t * width) / font_width) + i / 8] & (0x80 >> (i % 8 ))) != 0x00)
000186  4831              LDR      r0,|L9.588|
000188  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; width
00018a  4378              MULS     r0,r7,r0
00018c  4926              LDR      r1,|L9.552|
00018e  7809              LDRB     r1,[r1,#0]  ; font_width
000190  fb90f0f1          SDIV     r0,r0,r1
000194  fb00f00a          MUL      r0,r0,r10
000198  eb0000db          ADD      r0,r0,r11,LSR #3
00019c  a905              ADD      r1,sp,#0x14
00019e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
0001a0  f00b0207          AND      r2,r11,#7
0001a4  2180              MOVS     r1,#0x80
0001a6  4111              ASRS     r1,r1,r2
0001a8  4208              TST      r0,r1
0001aa  d005              BEQ      |L9.440|
;;;401    				{
;;;402    					LCD_PutPixel(x, y, _tFont->FrontColor);	/* 设置像素颜色为文字色 */
0001ac  886a              LDRH     r2,[r5,#2]
0001ae  e9dd1003          LDRD     r1,r0,[sp,#0xc]
0001b2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
0001b6  e009              B        |L9.460|
                  |L9.440|
;;;403    				}
;;;404    				else
;;;405    				{
;;;406    					if (_tFont->BackColor != CL_MASK)	/* 透明色 */
0001b8  88a8              LDRH     r0,[r5,#4]
0001ba  f5a04119          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9900
0001be  3999              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x99
0001c0  d004              BEQ      |L9.460|
;;;407    					{
;;;408    						LCD_PutPixel(x, y, _tFont->BackColor);	/* 设置像素颜色为文字背景色 */
0001c2  88aa              LDRH     r2,[r5,#4]
0001c4  e9dd1003          LDRD     r1,r0,[sp,#0xc]
0001c8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
                  |L9.460|
;;;409    					}
;;;410    				}
;;;411    
;;;412    				x++;
0001cc  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
0001ce  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0001d0  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
0001d2  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
0001d4  f10b0b01          ADD      r11,r11,#1            ;398
                  |L9.472|
0001d8  481c              LDR      r0,|L9.588|
0001da  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]            ;398  ; width
0001dc  4583              CMP      r11,r0                ;398
0001de  d3d2              BCC      |L9.390|
;;;413    			}
;;;414    			y++;
0001e0  9803              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
0001e2  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0001e4  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
0001e6  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
0001e8  f10a0001          ADD      r0,r10,#1             ;395
0001ec  fa1ffa80          UXTH     r10,r0                ;395
                  |L9.496|
0001f0  480c              LDR      r0,|L9.548|
0001f2  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]            ;395  ; font_height
0001f4  4582              CMP      r10,r0                ;395
0001f6  dbc0              BLT      |L9.378|
;;;415    		}
;;;416    
;;;417    		if (_tFont->Space > 0)
;;;418    		{
;;;419    			/* 如果文字底色按_tFont->usBackColor，并且字间距大于点阵的宽度，那么需要在文字之间填充(暂时未实现) */
;;;420    		}
;;;421    		_usX += width + _tFont->Space;	/* 列地址递增 */
0001f8  88e8              LDRH     r0,[r5,#6]
0001fa  4914              LDR      r1,|L9.588|
0001fc  7809              LDRB     r1,[r1,#0]  ; width
0001fe  4401              ADD      r1,r1,r0
000200  f8dd049c          LDR      r0,[sp,#0x49c]
000204  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000206  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
000208  f8cd049c          STR      r0,[sp,#0x49c]
;;;422    		_ptr++;			/* 指向下一个字符 */
00020c  f1090901          ADD      r9,r9,#1
                  |L9.528|
000210  f8990000          LDRB     r0,[r9,#0]            ;337
000214  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;337
000216  f47faf49          BNE      |L9.172|
                  |L9.538|
00021a  bf00              NOP                            ;351
;;;423    	}
;;;424    }
00021c  f20d4dac          ADD      sp,sp,#0x4ac
000220  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
;;;425    
                          ENDP

                  |L9.548|
                          DCD      font_height
                  |L9.552|
                          DCD      font_width
                  |L9.556|
                          DCD      font_bytes
                  |L9.560|
                          DCD      g_Ascii12
                  |L9.564|
                          DCD      g_Hz12
                  |L9.568|
                          DCD      g_Ascii16
                  |L9.572|
                          DCD      g_Hz24
                  |L9.576|
                          DCD      g_Hz48
                  |L9.580|
                          DCD      g_Hz96
                  |L9.584|
                          DCD      g_Hz16
                  |L9.588|
                          DCD      width

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DispStrEx||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DispStrEx PROC
;;;535    */
;;;536    void LCD_DispStrEx(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, char *_ptr, FONT_T *_tFont, uint16_t _Width,
000000  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;537    	uint8_t _Align)
;;;538    {
000004  b09f              SUB      sp,sp,#0x7c
000006  4683              MOV      r11,r0
000008  4691              MOV      r9,r2
00000a  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;539    	uint32_t i;
;;;540    	uint8_t code1;
;;;541    	uint8_t code2;
;;;542    	uint32_t address = 0;
00000c  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;543    	uint8_t buf[24 * 24 / 8];	/* 最大支持24点阵汉字 */
;;;544    	uint8_t width;
;;;545    	uint16_t m;
;;;546    	uint8_t font_width,font_height, font_bytes;
;;;547    	uint16_t x, y;
;;;548    	const uint8_t *pAscDot;
;;;549    	uint16_t offset;
;;;550    	uint16_t str_width;	/* 字符串实际宽度  */
;;;551    
;;;552    #ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;553    	const uint8_t *pHzDot;
;;;554    #else
;;;555    	uint32_t AddrHZK;
;;;556    #endif
;;;557    
;;;558    	/* 如果字体结构为空指针，则缺省按16点阵 */
;;;559    	if (_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_12)
00000e  8820              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0]
000010  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000012  d108              BNE      |L10.38|
;;;560    	{
;;;561    		font_height = 12;
000014  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
000016  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
;;;562    		font_width = 12;
000018  4682              MOV      r10,r0
;;;563    		font_bytes = 24;
00001a  2518              MOVS     r5,#0x18
;;;564    		pAscDot = g_Ascii12;
00001c  487d              LDR      r0,|L10.532|
00001e  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;565    
;;;566    	#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;567    		pHzDot = g_Hz12;
000020  f8df81f4          LDR      r8,|L10.536|
000024  e007              B        |L10.54|
                  |L10.38|
;;;568    	#else
;;;569    		AddrHZK = HZK12_ADDR;
;;;570    	#endif
;;;571    	}
;;;572    	else
;;;573    	{
;;;574    		/* 缺省是16点阵 */
;;;575    		font_height = 16;
000026  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000028  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
;;;576    		font_width = 16;
00002a  4682              MOV      r10,r0
;;;577    		font_bytes = 32;
00002c  2520              MOVS     r5,#0x20
;;;578    		pAscDot = g_Ascii16;
00002e  487b              LDR      r0,|L10.540|
000030  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;579    
;;;580    	#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;581    		pHzDot = g_Hz16;
000032  f8df81ec          LDR      r8,|L10.544|
                  |L10.54|
;;;582    	#else
;;;583    		AddrHZK = HZK16_ADDR;
;;;584    	#endif
;;;585    	}
;;;586    
;;;587    	str_width = LCD_GetStrWidth(_ptr, _tFont);	/* 计算字符串实际宽度 */
000036  4621              MOV      r1,r4
000038  4648              MOV      r0,r9
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_GetStrWidth
00003e  4607              MOV      r7,r0
;;;588    	offset = 0;
000040  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000042  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;589    	if (_Width > str_width)
000044  992c              LDR      r1,[sp,#0xb0]
000046  42b9              CMP      r1,r7
000048  dd11              BLE      |L10.110|
;;;590    	{
;;;591    		if (_Align == ALIGN_RIGHT)	/* 右对齐 */
00004a  982d              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xb4]
00004c  2802              CMP      r0,#2
00004e  d104              BNE      |L10.90|
;;;592    		{
;;;593    			offset = _Width - str_width;
000050  982c              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xb0]
000052  1bc0              SUBS     r0,r0,r7
000054  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
000056  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
000058  e009              B        |L10.110|
                  |L10.90|
;;;594    		}
;;;595    		else if (_Align == ALIGN_CENTER)	/* 左对齐 */
00005a  982d              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xb4]
00005c  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00005e  d106              BNE      |L10.110|
;;;596    		{
;;;597    			offset = (_Width - str_width) / 2;
000060  992c              LDR      r1,[sp,#0xb0]
000062  1bc8              SUBS     r0,r1,r7
000064  eb0071d0          ADD      r1,r0,r0,LSR #31
000068  f3c1014f          UBFX     r1,r1,#1,#16
00006c  9103              STR      r1,[sp,#0xc]
                  |L10.110|
;;;598    		}
;;;599    		else	/* 左对齐 ALIGN_LEFT */
;;;600    		{
;;;601    			;
;;;602    		}
;;;603    	}
;;;604    
;;;605    	/* 左侧填背景色, 中间对齐和右边对齐  */
;;;606    	if (offset > 0)
00006e  9803              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
000070  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000072  dd0f              BLE      |L10.148|
;;;607    	{
;;;608    		LCD_Fill_Rect(_usX, _usY, LCD_GetFontHeight(_tFont), offset,  _tFont->BackColor);
000074  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000076  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_GetFontHeight
00007a  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
00007c  88a0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#4]
00007e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000080  4658              MOV      r0,r11
000082  e9dd2302          LDRD     r2,r3,[sp,#8]
000086  9920              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x80]
000088  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;609    		_usX += offset;
00008c  9803              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
00008e  4458              ADD      r0,r0,r11
000090  fa1ffb80          UXTH     r11,r0
                  |L10.148|
;;;610    	}
;;;611    	/* 右侧填背景色 */
;;;612    	if (_Width > str_width)
000094  982c              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xb0]
000096  42b8              CMP      r0,r7
000098  dd11              BLE      |L10.190|
;;;613    	{
;;;614    		LCD_Fill_Rect(_usX + str_width, _usY, LCD_GetFontHeight(_tFont), _Width - str_width - offset,  _tFont->BackColor);
00009a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00009c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_GetFontHeight
0000a0  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
0000a2  88a0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#4]
0000a4  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0000a6  992c              LDR      r1,[sp,#0xb0]
0000a8  1bca              SUBS     r2,r1,r7
0000aa  9903              LDR      r1,[sp,#0xc]
0000ac  1a51              SUBS     r1,r2,r1
0000ae  b28b              UXTH     r3,r1
0000b0  eb0b0107          ADD      r1,r11,r7
0000b4  b288              UXTH     r0,r1
0000b6  9a02              LDR      r2,[sp,#8]
0000b8  9920              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x80]
0000ba  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
                  |L10.190|
;;;615    	}
;;;616    
;;;617    	/* 开始循环处理字符 */
;;;618    	while (*_ptr != 0)
0000be  e0a0              B        |L10.514|
                  |L10.192|
;;;619    	{
;;;620    		code1 = *_ptr;	/* 读取字符串数据， 该数据可能是ascii代码，也可能汉字代码的高字节 */
0000c0  f8990000          LDRB     r0,[r9,#0]
0000c4  901d              STR      r0,[sp,#0x74]
;;;621    		if (code1 < 0x80)
0000c6  981d              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x74]
0000c8  2880              CMP      r0,#0x80
0000ca  da16              BGE      |L10.250|
;;;622    		{
;;;623    			/* 将ascii字符点阵复制到buf */
;;;624    			memcpy(buf, &pAscDot[code1 * (font_bytes / 2)], (font_bytes / 2));
0000cc  9502              STR      r5,[sp,#8]
0000ce  eb0570d5          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSR #31
0000d2  ea4f0c60          ASR      r12,r0,#1
0000d6  9501              STR      r5,[sp,#4]
0000d8  9b1d              LDR      r3,[sp,#0x74]
0000da  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
0000dc  fb03010c          MLA      r1,r3,r12,r0
0000e0  eb0570d5          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSR #31
0000e4  1042              ASRS     r2,r0,#1
0000e6  a80a              ADD      r0,sp,#0x28
0000e8  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;625    			width = font_width / 2;
0000ec  4650              MOV      r0,r10
0000ee  eb0a71d0          ADD      r1,r10,r0,LSR #31
0000f2  f3c10147          UBFX     r1,r1,#1,#8
0000f6  9109              STR      r1,[sp,#0x24]
0000f8  e038              B        |L10.364|
                  |L10.250|
;;;626    		}
;;;627    		else
;;;628    		{
;;;629    			code2 = *++_ptr;
0000fa  f1090001          ADD      r0,r9,#1
0000fe  4681              MOV      r9,r0
000100  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
000102  901c              STR      r0,[sp,#0x70]
;;;630    			if (code2 == 0)
000104  981c              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x70]
000106  b900              CBNZ     r0,|L10.266|
;;;631    			{
;;;632    				break;
000108  e080              B        |L10.524|
                  |L10.266|
;;;633    			}
;;;634    
;;;635    			/* 计算16点阵汉字点阵地址
;;;636    				ADDRESS = [(code1-0xa1) * 94 + (code2-0xa1)] * 32
;;;637    				;
;;;638    			*/
;;;639    			#ifdef USE_SMALL_FONT
;;;640    				m = 0;
00010a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00010c  9008              STR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
;;;641    				while(1)
00010e  e029              B        |L10.356|
                  |L10.272|
;;;642    				{
;;;643    					address = m * (font_bytes + 2);
000110  1ca9              ADDS     r1,r5,#2
000112  9808              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
000114  fb00f601          MUL      r6,r0,r1
;;;644    					m++;
000118  9808              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
00011a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00011c  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
00011e  9008              STR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
;;;645    					if ((code1 == pHzDot[address + 0]) && (code2 == pHzDot[address + 1]))
000120  f8181006          LDRB     r1,[r8,r6]
000124  981d              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x74]
000126  4281              CMP      r1,r0
000128  d10d              BNE      |L10.326|
00012a  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1
00012c  f8181000          LDRB     r1,[r8,r0]
000130  981c              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x70]
000132  4281              CMP      r1,r0
000134  d107              BNE      |L10.326|
;;;646    					{
;;;647    						address += 2;
000136  1cb6              ADDS     r6,r6,#2
;;;648    						memcpy(buf, &pHzDot[address], font_bytes);
000138  eb080106          ADD      r1,r8,r6
00013c  462a              MOV      r2,r5
00013e  a80a              ADD      r0,sp,#0x28
000140  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;649    						break;
000144  e00f              B        |L10.358|
                  |L10.326|
;;;650    					}
;;;651    					else if ((pHzDot[address + 0] == 0xFF) && (pHzDot[address + 1] == 0xFF))
000146  f8180006          LDRB     r0,[r8,r6]
00014a  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00014c  d10a              BNE      |L10.356|
00014e  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1
000150  f8180000          LDRB     r0,[r8,r0]
000154  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000156  d105              BNE      |L10.356|
;;;652    					{
;;;653    						/* 字库搜索完毕，未找到，则填充全FF */
;;;654    						memset(buf, 0xFF, font_bytes);
000158  22ff              MOVS     r2,#0xff
00015a  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00015c  a80a              ADD      r0,sp,#0x28
00015e  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memset
;;;655    						break;
000162  e000              B        |L10.358|
                  |L10.356|
000164  e7d4              B        |L10.272|
                  |L10.358|
000166  bf00              NOP                            ;649
;;;656    					}
;;;657    				}
;;;658    			#else	/* 用全字库 */
;;;659    				/* 此处需要根据字库文件存放位置进行修改 */
;;;660    				if (code1 >=0xA1 && code1 <= 0xA9 && code2 >=0xA1)
;;;661    				{
;;;662    					address = ((code1 - 0xA1) * 94 + (code2 - 0xA1)) * font_bytes + AddrHZK;
;;;663    				}
;;;664    				else if (code1 >=0xB0 && code1 <= 0xF7 && code2 >=0xA1)
;;;665    				{
;;;666    					address = ((code1 - 0xB0) * 94 + (code2 - 0xA1) + 846) * font_bytes + AddrHZK;
;;;667    				}
;;;668    				memcpy(buf, (const uint8_t *)address, font_bytes);
;;;669    			#endif
;;;670    
;;;671    				width = font_width;
000168  f8cda024          STR      r10,[sp,#0x24]
                  |L10.364|
;;;672    		}
;;;673    
;;;674    		y = _usY;
00016c  9820              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x80]
00016e  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;675    		/* 开始刷LCD */
;;;676    		for (m = 0; m < font_height; m++)	/* 字符高度 */
000170  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000172  9008              STR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
000174  e039              B        |L10.490|
                  |L10.374|
;;;677    		{
;;;678    			x = _usX;
000176  f8cdb018          STR      r11,[sp,#0x18]
;;;679    			for (i = 0; i < width; i++)	/* 字符宽度 */
00017a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00017c  901e              STR      r0,[sp,#0x78]
00017e  e028              B        |L10.466|
                  |L10.384|
;;;680    			{
;;;681    				if ((buf[m * ((2 * width) / font_width) + i / 8] & (0x80 >> (i % 8 ))) != 0x00)
000180  9809              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x24]
000182  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000184  fb90f0fa          SDIV     r0,r0,r10
000188  9908              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x20]
00018a  4348              MULS     r0,r1,r0
00018c  991e              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x78]
00018e  eb0000d1          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSR #3
000192  a90a              ADD      r1,sp,#0x28
000194  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000196  991e              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x78]
000198  f0010207          AND      r2,r1,#7
00019c  2180              MOVS     r1,#0x80
00019e  4111              ASRS     r1,r1,r2
0001a0  4208              TST      r0,r1
0001a2  d005              BEQ      |L10.432|
;;;682    				{
;;;683    					LCD_PutPixel(x, y, _tFont->FrontColor);	/* 设置像素颜色为文字色 */
0001a4  8862              LDRH     r2,[r4,#2]
0001a6  e9dd1005          LDRD     r1,r0,[sp,#0x14]
0001aa  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
0001ae  e009              B        |L10.452|
                  |L10.432|
;;;684    				}
;;;685    				else
;;;686    				{
;;;687    					if (_tFont->BackColor != CL_MASK)	/* 透明色 */
0001b0  88a0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#4]
0001b2  f5a04119          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9900
0001b6  3999              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x99
0001b8  d004              BEQ      |L10.452|
;;;688    					{
;;;689    						LCD_PutPixel(x, y, _tFont->BackColor);	/* 设置像素颜色为文字背景色 */
0001ba  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
0001bc  e9dd1005          LDRD     r1,r0,[sp,#0x14]
0001c0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
                  |L10.452|
;;;690    					}
;;;691    				}
;;;692    
;;;693    				x++;
0001c4  9806              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
0001c6  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0001c8  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
0001ca  9006              STR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
0001cc  981e              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x78]         ;679
0001ce  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;679
0001d0  901e              STR      r0,[sp,#0x78]         ;679
                  |L10.466|
0001d2  9909              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x24]         ;679
0001d4  981e              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x78]         ;679
0001d6  4288              CMP      r0,r1                 ;679
0001d8  d3d2              BCC      |L10.384|
;;;694    			}
;;;695    			y++;
0001da  9805              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
0001dc  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0001de  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
0001e0  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
0001e2  9808              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x20]         ;676
0001e4  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;676
0001e6  b280              UXTH     r0,r0                 ;676
0001e8  9008              STR      r0,[sp,#0x20]         ;676
                  |L10.490|
0001ea  e9dd1007          LDRD     r1,r0,[sp,#0x1c]      ;676
0001ee  4288              CMP      r0,r1                 ;676
0001f0  dbc1              BLT      |L10.374|
;;;696    		}
;;;697    
;;;698    		if (_tFont->Space > 0)
;;;699    		{
;;;700    			/* 如果文字底色按_tFont->usBackColor，并且字间距大于点阵的宽度，那么需要在文字之间填充(暂时未实现) */
;;;701    		}
;;;702    		_usX += width + _tFont->Space;	/* 列地址递增 */
0001f2  88e1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#6]
0001f4  9809              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x24]
0001f6  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
0001f8  4458              ADD      r0,r0,r11
0001fa  fa1ffb80          UXTH     r11,r0
;;;703    		_ptr++;			/* 指向下一个字符 */
0001fe  f1090901          ADD      r9,r9,#1
                  |L10.514|
000202  f8990000          LDRB     r0,[r9,#0]            ;618
000206  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;618
000208  f47faf5a          BNE      |L10.192|
                  |L10.524|
00020c  bf00              NOP                            ;632
;;;704    	}
;;;705    }
00020e  b023              ADD      sp,sp,#0x8c
000210  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
;;;706    
                          ENDP

                  |L10.532|
                          DCD      g_Ascii12
                  |L10.536|
                          DCD      g_Hz12
                  |L10.540|
                          DCD      g_Ascii16
                  |L10.544|
                          DCD      g_Hz16

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawBMP||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawBMP PROC
;;;905    */
;;;906    void LCD_DrawBMP(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, uint16_t _usHeight, uint16_t _usWidth, uint16_t *_ptr)
000000  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;907    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000008  4617              MOV      r7,r2
00000a  4698              MOV      r8,r3
00000c  9c08              LDR      r4,[sp,#0x20]
;;;908    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000e  4811              LDR      r0,|L11.84|
000010  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000012  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000014  d107              BNE      |L11.38|
;;;909    	{
;;;910    		RA8875_DrawBMP(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _ptr);
000016  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000018  463a              MOV      r2,r7
00001a  4631              MOV      r1,r6
00001c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00001e  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
000020  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DrawBMP
000024  e014              B        |L11.80|
                  |L11.38|
;;;911    	}
;;;912    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
000026  480b              LDR      r0,|L11.84|
000028  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00002a  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
00002e  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
000030  d107              BNE      |L11.66|
;;;913    	{
;;;914    		ILI9488_DrawBMP(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _ptr);
000032  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000034  463a              MOV      r2,r7
000036  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000038  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00003a  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
00003c  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_DrawBMP
000040  e006              B        |L11.80|
                  |L11.66|
;;;915    	}
;;;916    	else
;;;917    	{
;;;918    		SPFD5420_DrawBMP(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _ptr);
000042  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000044  463a              MOV      r2,r7
000046  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000048  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00004a  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawBMP
                  |L11.80|
;;;919    	}
;;;920    }
000050  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;921    
                          ENDP

                  |L11.84|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawBmp32||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawBmp32 PROC
;;;1221   */
;;;1222   void LCD_DrawBmp32(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, uint16_t _usHeight, uint16_t _usWidth, uint8_t *_pBmp)
000000  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;1223   {
000004  b087              SUB      sp,sp,#0x1c
000006  4680              MOV      r8,r0
000008  4689              MOV      r9,r1
;;;1224   	const uint8_t *p;
;;;1225   	uint16_t usOldRGB, usNewRGB;
;;;1226   	int16_t x, y;		/* 用于记录窗口内的相对坐标 */
;;;1227   	uint8_t R1,G1,B1,A;	/* 新像素色彩分量 */
;;;1228   	uint8_t R0,G0,B0;	/* 旧像素色彩分量 */
;;;1229   
;;;1230   	p = (const uint8_t *)_pBmp;
00000a  9c14              LDR      r4,[sp,#0x50]
;;;1231   	p += 54;		/* 直接指向图像数据区 */
00000c  3436              ADDS     r4,r4,#0x36
;;;1232   
;;;1233   	/* 按照BMP位图次序，从左至右，从上至下扫描 */
;;;1234   	for (y = _usHeight - 1; y >= 0; y--)
00000e  9809              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x24]
000010  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000012  b207              SXTH     r7,r0
000014  e081              B        |L12.282|
                  |L12.22|
;;;1235   	{
;;;1236   		for (x = 0; x < _usWidth; x++)
000016  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
000018  e07a              B        |L12.272|
                  |L12.26|
;;;1237   		{
;;;1238   			B1 = *p++;
00001a  f8140b01          LDRB     r0,[r4],#1
00001e  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;1239   			G1 = *p++;
000020  f8140b01          LDRB     r0,[r4],#1
000024  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;1240   			R1 = *p++;
000026  f814bb01          LDRB     r11,[r4],#1
;;;1241   			A = *p++;	/* Alpha 值(透明度)，0-255, 0表示透明，1表示不透明, 中间值表示透明度 */
00002a  f8145b01          LDRB     r5,[r4],#1
;;;1242   
;;;1243   			if (A == 0x00)	/* 需要透明,显示背景 */
00002e  2d00              CMP      r5,#0
000030  d06c              BEQ      |L12.268|
;;;1244   			{
;;;1245   				;	/* 不用刷新背景 */
;;;1246   			}
;;;1247   			else if (A == 0xFF)	/* 完全不透明， 显示新像素 */
000032  2dff              CMP      r5,#0xff
000034  d114              BNE      |L12.96|
;;;1248   			{
;;;1249   				usNewRGB = RGB(R1, G1, B1);
000036  ea4f00eb          ASR      r0,r11,#3
00003a  02c1              LSLS     r1,r0,#11
00003c  9805              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
00003e  1080              ASRS     r0,r0,#2
000040  ea411140          ORR      r1,r1,r0,LSL #5
000044  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
000046  ea4100e0          ORR      r0,r1,r0,ASR #3
00004a  9006              STR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
;;;1250   				//if (_ucFocusMode == 1)
;;;1251   				//{
;;;1252   				//	usNewRGB = Blend565(usNewRGB, CL_YELLOW, 10);
;;;1253   				//}
;;;1254   				LCD_PutPixel(x + _usX, y + _usY, usNewRGB);
00004c  eb070209          ADD      r2,r7,r9
000050  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
000052  eb060208          ADD      r2,r6,r8
000056  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000058  9a06              LDR      r2,[sp,#0x18]
00005a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
00005e  e055              B        |L12.268|
                  |L12.96|
;;;1255   			}
;;;1256   			else 	/* 半透明 */
;;;1257   			{
;;;1258   				/* 计算公式： 实际显示颜色 = 前景颜色 * Alpha / 255 + 背景颜色 * (255-Alpha) / 255 */
;;;1259   				usOldRGB = LCD_GetPixel(x + _usX, y + _usY);
000060  eb070209          ADD      r2,r7,r9
000064  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
000066  eb060208          ADD      r2,r6,r8
00006a  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
00006c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_GetPixel
000070  4682              MOV      r10,r0
;;;1260   				R0 = RGB565_R(usOldRGB);
000072  20f8              MOVS     r0,#0xf8
000074  ea00202a          AND      r0,r0,r10,ASR #8
000078  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1261   				G0 = RGB565_G(usOldRGB);
00007a  20fc              MOVS     r0,#0xfc
00007c  ea0000ea          AND      r0,r0,r10,ASR #3
000080  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
;;;1262   				B0 = RGB565_B(usOldRGB);
000082  20f8              MOVS     r0,#0xf8
000084  ea0000ca          AND      r0,r0,r10,LSL #3
000088  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
;;;1263   
;;;1264   				R1 = (R1 * A) / 255 + R0 * (255 - A) / 255;
00008a  fb0bf005          MUL      r0,r11,r5
00008e  21ff              MOVS     r1,#0xff
000090  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
000094  f1c501ff          RSB      r1,r5,#0xff
000098  9803              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
00009a  4341              MULS     r1,r0,r1
00009c  20ff              MOVS     r0,#0xff
00009e  fb91f0f0          SDIV     r0,r1,r0
0000a2  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0000a4  f0000bff          AND      r11,r0,#0xff
;;;1265   				G1 = (G1 * A) / 255 + G0 * (255 - A) / 255;
0000a8  9805              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
0000aa  4368              MULS     r0,r5,r0
0000ac  21ff              MOVS     r1,#0xff
0000ae  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
0000b2  f1c501ff          RSB      r1,r5,#0xff
0000b6  9802              LDR      r0,[sp,#8]
0000b8  4341              MULS     r1,r0,r1
0000ba  20ff              MOVS     r0,#0xff
0000bc  fb91f0f0          SDIV     r0,r1,r0
0000c0  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0000c2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000c4  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;1266   				B1 = (B1 * A) / 255 + B0 * (255 - A) / 255;
0000c6  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
0000c8  4368              MULS     r0,r5,r0
0000ca  21ff              MOVS     r1,#0xff
0000cc  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
0000d0  f1c501ff          RSB      r1,r5,#0xff
0000d4  9801              LDR      r0,[sp,#4]
0000d6  4341              MULS     r1,r0,r1
0000d8  20ff              MOVS     r0,#0xff
0000da  fb91f0f0          SDIV     r0,r1,r0
0000de  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0000e0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000e2  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;1267   				usNewRGB = RGB(R1, G1, B1);
0000e4  ea4f00eb          ASR      r0,r11,#3
0000e8  02c1              LSLS     r1,r0,#11
0000ea  9805              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
0000ec  1080              ASRS     r0,r0,#2
0000ee  ea411140          ORR      r1,r1,r0,LSL #5
0000f2  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
0000f4  ea4100e0          ORR      r0,r1,r0,ASR #3
0000f8  9006              STR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
;;;1268   				//if (_ucFocusMode == 1)
;;;1269   				//{
;;;1270   				//	usNewRGB = Blend565(usNewRGB, CL_YELLOW, 10);
;;;1271   				//}
;;;1272   				LCD_PutPixel(x + _usX, y + _usY, usNewRGB);
0000fa  eb070209          ADD      r2,r7,r9
0000fe  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
000100  eb060208          ADD      r2,r6,r8
000104  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000106  9a06              LDR      r2,[sp,#0x18]
000108  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
                  |L12.268|
00010c  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1              ;1236
00010e  b206              SXTH     r6,r0                 ;1236
                  |L12.272|
000110  980a              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x28]         ;1236
000112  4286              CMP      r6,r0                 ;1236
000114  db81              BLT      |L12.26|
000116  1e78              SUBS     r0,r7,#1              ;1234
000118  b207              SXTH     r7,r0                 ;1234
                  |L12.282|
00011a  2f00              CMP      r7,#0                 ;1234
00011c  f6bfaf7b          BGE      |L12.22|
;;;1273   			}
;;;1274   		}
;;;1275   	}
;;;1276   }
000120  b00b              ADD      sp,sp,#0x2c
000122  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
;;;1277   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawButton||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawButton PROC
;;;1470   */
;;;1471   void LCD_DrawButton(BUTTON_T *_pBtn)
000000  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;1472   {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1473   #if 1
;;;1474   		uint16_t len, fwidth, x, y;
;;;1475   
;;;1476   		if (_pBtn->Focus == 1)
000006  7d20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x14]
000008  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00000a  d15f              BNE      |L13.204|
;;;1477   		{
;;;1478   			/* 仿XP风格，平面编辑框 */
;;;1479   			LCD_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left, _pBtn->Top, _pBtn->Height, _pBtn->Width, BUTTON_BORDER_COLOR);
00000c  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
00000e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000010  8923              LDRH     r3,[r4,#8]
000012  88e2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#6]
000014  88a1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#4]
000016  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
000018  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1480   			LCD_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 1, _pBtn->Top + 1, _pBtn->Height - 2, _pBtn->Width - 2, BUTTON_BORDER1_COLOR);
00001c  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000020  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000022  f8b4c008          LDRH     r12,[r4,#8]
000026  f1ac0c02          SUB      r12,r12,#2
00002a  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
00002e  f8b4c006          LDRH     r12,[r4,#6]
000032  f1ac0c02          SUB      r12,r12,#2
000036  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
00003a  f8b4c004          LDRH     r12,[r4,#4]
00003e  f10c0c01          ADD      r12,r12,#1
000042  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
000046  f8b4c002          LDRH     r12,[r4,#2]
00004a  f10c0c01          ADD      r12,r12,#1
00004e  fa1ff08c          UXTH     r0,r12
000052  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1481   			LCD_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 2, _pBtn->Top + 2, _pBtn->Height - 4, _pBtn->Width - 4, BUTTON_BORDER2_COLOR);
000056  f24940b2          MOV      r0,#0x94b2
00005a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00005c  f8b4c008          LDRH     r12,[r4,#8]
000060  f1ac0c04          SUB      r12,r12,#4
000064  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
000068  f8b4c006          LDRH     r12,[r4,#6]
00006c  f1ac0c04          SUB      r12,r12,#4
000070  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
000074  f8b4c004          LDRH     r12,[r4,#4]
000078  f10c0c02          ADD      r12,r12,#2
00007c  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
000080  f8b4c002          LDRH     r12,[r4,#2]
000084  f10c0c02          ADD      r12,r12,#2
000088  fa1ff08c          UXTH     r0,r12
00008c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1482   
;;;1483   			LCD_Fill_Rect(_pBtn->Left + 3, _pBtn->Top + 3, _pBtn->Height - 6, _pBtn->Width - 6, BUTTON_ACTIVE_COLOR);	/* 选中后的底色 */
000090  f64770ff          MOV      r0,#0x7fff
000094  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000096  f8b4c008          LDRH     r12,[r4,#8]
00009a  f1ac0c06          SUB      r12,r12,#6
00009e  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
0000a2  f8b4c006          LDRH     r12,[r4,#6]
0000a6  f1ac0c06          SUB      r12,r12,#6
0000aa  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
0000ae  f8b4c004          LDRH     r12,[r4,#4]
0000b2  f10c0c03          ADD      r12,r12,#3
0000b6  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
0000ba  f8b4c002          LDRH     r12,[r4,#2]
0000be  f10c0c03          ADD      r12,r12,#3
0000c2  fa1ff08c          UXTH     r0,r12
0000c6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
0000ca  e05e              B        |L13.394|
                  |L13.204|
;;;1484   		}
;;;1485   		else
;;;1486   		{
;;;1487   			/* 仿XP风格，平面编辑框 */
;;;1488   			LCD_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left, _pBtn->Top, _pBtn->Height, _pBtn->Width, BUTTON_BORDER_COLOR);
0000cc  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
0000ce  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0000d0  8923              LDRH     r3,[r4,#8]
0000d2  88e2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#6]
0000d4  88a1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#4]
0000d6  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
0000d8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1489   			LCD_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 1, _pBtn->Top + 1, _pBtn->Height - 2, _pBtn->Width - 2, BUTTON_BORDER1_COLOR);
0000dc  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
0000e0  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0000e2  f8b4c008          LDRH     r12,[r4,#8]
0000e6  f1ac0c02          SUB      r12,r12,#2
0000ea  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
0000ee  f8b4c006          LDRH     r12,[r4,#6]
0000f2  f1ac0c02          SUB      r12,r12,#2
0000f6  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
0000fa  f8b4c004          LDRH     r12,[r4,#4]
0000fe  f10c0c01          ADD      r12,r12,#1
000102  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
000106  f8b4c002          LDRH     r12,[r4,#2]
00010a  f10c0c01          ADD      r12,r12,#1
00010e  fa1ff08c          UXTH     r0,r12
000112  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1490   			LCD_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 2, _pBtn->Top + 2, _pBtn->Height - 4, _pBtn->Width - 4, BUTTON_BORDER2_COLOR);
000116  f24940b2          MOV      r0,#0x94b2
00011a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00011c  f8b4c008          LDRH     r12,[r4,#8]
000120  f1ac0c04          SUB      r12,r12,#4
000124  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
000128  f8b4c006          LDRH     r12,[r4,#6]
00012c  f1ac0c04          SUB      r12,r12,#4
000130  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
000134  f8b4c004          LDRH     r12,[r4,#4]
000138  f10c0c02          ADD      r12,r12,#2
00013c  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
000140  f8b4c002          LDRH     r12,[r4,#2]
000144  f10c0c02          ADD      r12,r12,#2
000148  fa1ff08c          UXTH     r0,r12
00014c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1491   
;;;1492   			LCD_Fill_Rect(_pBtn->Left + 3, _pBtn->Top + 3, _pBtn->Height - 6, _pBtn->Width - 6, BUTTON_BACK_COLOR);		/* 未选中的底色 */
000150  f64c6059          MOV      r0,#0xce59
000154  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000156  f8b4c008          LDRH     r12,[r4,#8]
00015a  f1ac0c06          SUB      r12,r12,#6
00015e  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
000162  f8b4c006          LDRH     r12,[r4,#6]
000166  f1ac0c06          SUB      r12,r12,#6
00016a  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
00016e  f8b4c004          LDRH     r12,[r4,#4]
000172  f10c0c03          ADD      r12,r12,#3
000176  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
00017a  f8b4c002          LDRH     r12,[r4,#2]
00017e  f10c0c03          ADD      r12,r12,#3
000182  fa1ff08c          UXTH     r0,r12
000186  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
                  |L13.394|
;;;1493   		}
;;;1494   
;;;1495   		/* 文字居中 */
;;;1496   		len = strlen(_pBtn->pCaption);
00018a  6920              LDR      r0,[r4,#0x10]
00018c  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
000190  b286              UXTH     r6,r0
;;;1497   
;;;1498   		if (_pBtn->Font->FontCode == FC_ST_16)
000192  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
000194  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]
000196  b908              CBNZ     r0,|L13.412|
;;;1499   		{
;;;1500   			fwidth = 8;		/* 字体宽度 */
000198  2508              MOVS     r5,#8
00019a  e012              B        |L13.450|
                  |L13.412|
;;;1501   		}
;;;1502   		else if (_pBtn->Font->FontCode == FC_ST_12)
00019c  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
00019e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]
0001a0  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0001a2  d101              BNE      |L13.424|
;;;1503   		{
;;;1504   			fwidth = 6;		/* 字体宽度 */
0001a4  2506              MOVS     r5,#6
0001a6  e00c              B        |L13.450|
                  |L13.424|
;;;1505   		}
;;;1506   		else if (_pBtn->Font->FontCode == FC_ST_24)
0001a8  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
0001aa  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]
0001ac  2802              CMP      r0,#2
0001ae  d101              BNE      |L13.436|
;;;1507   		{
;;;1508   			fwidth = 12;		/* 字体宽度 */
0001b0  250c              MOVS     r5,#0xc
0001b2  e006              B        |L13.450|
                  |L13.436|
;;;1509   		}
;;;1510   		else if (_pBtn->Font->FontCode == FC_ST_48)
0001b4  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
0001b6  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]
0001b8  2803              CMP      r0,#3
0001ba  d101              BNE      |L13.448|
;;;1511   		{
;;;1512   			fwidth = 24;		/* 字体宽度 */
0001bc  2518              MOVS     r5,#0x18
0001be  e000              B        |L13.450|
                  |L13.448|
;;;1513   		}
;;;1514   		else
;;;1515   		{
;;;1516   			fwidth = 8;		/* 字体宽度 */
0001c0  2508              MOVS     r5,#8
                  |L13.450|
;;;1517   		}
;;;1518   		x = _pBtn->Left + _pBtn->Width / 2 - (len * fwidth) / 2;
0001c2  8921              LDRH     r1,[r4,#8]
0001c4  eb0172d1          ADD      r2,r1,r1,LSR #31
0001c8  8863              LDRH     r3,[r4,#2]
0001ca  eb030362          ADD      r3,r3,r2,ASR #1
0001ce  fb06f005          MUL      r0,r6,r5
0001d2  eb0072d0          ADD      r2,r0,r0,LSR #31
0001d6  eba30262          SUB      r2,r3,r2,ASR #1
0001da  b297              UXTH     r7,r2
;;;1519   		y = _pBtn->Top + _pBtn->Height / 2 - fwidth;
0001dc  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
0001de  eb0071d0          ADD      r1,r0,r0,LSR #31
0001e2  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
0001e4  eb020161          ADD      r1,r2,r1,ASR #1
0001e8  1b49              SUBS     r1,r1,r5
0001ea  fa1ff881          UXTH     r8,r1
;;;1520   
;;;1521   		LCD_DispStr(x, y, _pBtn->pCaption, _pBtn->Font);
0001ee  4641              MOV      r1,r8
0001f0  4638              MOV      r0,r7
0001f2  e9d43203          LDRD     r3,r2,[r4,#0xc]
0001f6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;1522   #else
;;;1523   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
;;;1524   	{
;;;1525   		uint16_t len, x, y;
;;;1526   
;;;1527   		if (_pBtn->Focus == 1)
;;;1528   		{
;;;1529   			/* 仿XP风格，平面编辑框 */
;;;1530   			RA8875_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left, _pBtn->Top, _pBtn->Height, _pBtn->Width, BUTTON_BORDER_COLOR);
;;;1531   			RA8875_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 1, _pBtn->Top + 1, _pBtn->Height - 2, _pBtn->Width - 2, BUTTON_BORDER1_COLOR);
;;;1532   			RA8875_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 2, _pBtn->Top + 2, _pBtn->Height - 4, _pBtn->Width - 4, BUTTON_BORDER2_COLOR);
;;;1533   
;;;1534   			RA8875_FillRect(_pBtn->Left + 3, _pBtn->Top + 3, _pBtn->Height - 6, _pBtn->Width - 6, BUTTON_ACTIVE_COLOR);
;;;1535   
;;;1536   			RA8875_SetBackColor(BUTTON_ACTIVE_COLOR);
;;;1537   		}
;;;1538   		else
;;;1539   		{
;;;1540   			/* 仿XP风格，平面编辑框 */
;;;1541   			RA8875_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left, _pBtn->Top, _pBtn->Height, _pBtn->Width, BUTTON_BORDER_COLOR);
;;;1542   			RA8875_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 1, _pBtn->Top + 1, _pBtn->Height - 2, _pBtn->Width - 2, BUTTON_BORDER1_COLOR);
;;;1543   			RA8875_DrawRect(_pBtn->Left + 2, _pBtn->Top + 2, _pBtn->Height - 4, _pBtn->Width - 4, BUTTON_BORDER2_COLOR);
;;;1544   
;;;1545   			RA8875_FillRect(_pBtn->Left + 3, _pBtn->Top + 3, _pBtn->Height - 6, _pBtn->Width - 6, BUTTON_BACK_COLOR);
;;;1546   
;;;1547   			RA8875_SetBackColor(BUTTON_BACK_COLOR);
;;;1548   		}
;;;1549   
;;;1550   		#if 1	/* 按钮文字字体和颜色固定 */
;;;1551   			if (strcmp(_pBtn->Caption, "←") == 0)	/* 退格键特殊处理 */
;;;1552   			{
;;;1553   				/* 退格键符号是单像素笔画，太细了不协调，因此特殊处理 */
;;;1554   				RA8875_SetFont(RA_FONT_16, 0, 0);
;;;1555   				RA8875_SetFrontColor(CL_BLACK);
;;;1556   				RA8875_SetTextZoom(RA_SIZE_X2, RA_SIZE_X2);	/* 放大2倍 */
;;;1557   			}
;;;1558   			else
;;;1559   			{
;;;1560   				RA8875_SetFont(RA_FONT_16, 0, 0);
;;;1561   				RA8875_SetFrontColor(CL_BLACK);
;;;1562   				RA8875_SetTextZoom(RA_SIZE_X1, RA_SIZE_X1);	/* 放大1倍 */
;;;1563   			}
;;;1564   		#else	/* 按钮文字字体和颜色有应用程序指定 */
;;;1565   			RA8875_SetFont(_pBtn->Font.FontCode, 0, 0);
;;;1566   			RA8875_SetFrontColor(_pBtn->Font.FrontColor);
;;;1567   		#endif
;;;1568   
;;;1569   		/* 文字居中 */
;;;1570   		len = strlen(_pBtn->Caption);
;;;1571   
;;;1572   		/* 此处统计不等宽字符有问题。暂时特殊处理下 */
;;;1573   		if (len != 3)
;;;1574   		{
;;;1575   			x = _pBtn->Left + (_pBtn->Width - len * 16) / 2;
;;;1576   		}
;;;1577   		else
;;;1578   		{
;;;1579   			x = _pBtn->Left + (_pBtn->Width - len * 20) / 2;
;;;1580   		}
;;;1581   
;;;1582   		/* 对特殊字符特殊处理 */
;;;1583   		if ((len == 1) && (_pBtn->Caption[0] == '.'))
;;;1584   		{
;;;1585   			y = _pBtn->Top + 3;
;;;1586   			x += 3;
;;;1587   		}
;;;1588   		else
;;;1589   		{
;;;1590   			y = _pBtn->Top + 3;
;;;1591   		}
;;;1592   
;;;1593   		RA8875_DispStr(x, y, _pBtn->Caption);
;;;1594   
;;;1595   		RA8875_SetTextZoom(RA_SIZE_X1, RA_SIZE_X1);	/* 还原放大1倍 */
;;;1596   	}
;;;1597   #endif
;;;1598   }
0001fa  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;1599   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawCheckBox||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawCheckBox PROC
;;;1337   */
;;;1338   void LCD_DrawCheckBox(CHECK_T *_pCheckBox)
000000  b57c              PUSH     {r2-r6,lr}
;;;1339   {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1340   #if 1
;;;1341   	uint16_t x, y;
;;;1342   
;;;1343   	/* 目前只做了16点阵汉字的大小 */
;;;1344   
;;;1345   	/* 绘制外框 */
;;;1346   	x = _pCheckBox->Left;
000004  8865              LDRH     r5,[r4,#2]
;;;1347   	LCD_DrawRect(x, _pCheckBox->Top, CHECK_BOX_H, CHECK_BOX_W, CHECK_BOX_BORDER_COLOR);
000006  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000008  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00000a  88a1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#4]
00000c  2318              MOVS     r3,#0x18
00000e  461a              MOV      r2,r3
000010  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000012  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1348   	LCD_DrawRect(x + 1, _pCheckBox->Top + 1, CHECK_BOX_H - 2, CHECK_BOX_W - 2, CHECK_BOX_BORDER_COLOR);
000016  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000018  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00001a  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
00001c  1c52              ADDS     r2,r2,#1
00001e  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
000020  1c6a              ADDS     r2,r5,#1
000022  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000024  2316              MOVS     r3,#0x16
000026  461a              MOV      r2,r3
000028  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1349   	LCD_Fill_Rect(x + 2, _pCheckBox->Top + 2, CHECK_BOX_H - 4, CHECK_BOX_W - 4, CHECK_BOX_BACK_COLOR);
00002c  f64c6059          MOV      r0,#0xce59
000030  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000032  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
000034  1c92              ADDS     r2,r2,#2
000036  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
000038  1caa              ADDS     r2,r5,#2
00003a  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
00003c  2314              MOVS     r3,#0x14
00003e  461a              MOV      r2,r3
000040  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;1350   
;;;1351   	/* 绘制文本标签 */
;;;1352   	x = _pCheckBox->Left + CHECK_BOX_W + 2;
000044  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
000046  301a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x1a
000048  b285              UXTH     r5,r0
;;;1353   	y = _pCheckBox->Top + CHECK_BOX_H / 2 - 8;
00004a  88a0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#4]
00004c  1d00              ADDS     r0,r0,#4
00004e  b286              UXTH     r6,r0
;;;1354   	LCD_DispStr(x, y, _pCheckBox->pCaption, _pCheckBox->Font);
000050  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000052  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000054  e9d43203          LDRD     r3,r2,[r4,#0xc]
000058  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;1355   
;;;1356   	if (_pCheckBox->Checked)
00005c  7d20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x14]
00005e  b1c0              CBZ      r0,|L14.146|
;;;1357   	{
;;;1358   		FONT_T font;
;;;1359   
;;;1360   	    font.FontCode = FC_ST_16;
000060  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000062  f8ad0000          STRH     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;1361   		font.BackColor = CL_MASK;
000066  f6491099          MOV      r0,#0x9999
00006a  f8ad0004          STRH     r0,[sp,#4]
;;;1362   		font.FrontColor = CHECK_BOX_CHECKED_COLOR;	/* 钩的颜色 */
00006e  f44f4078          MOV      r0,#0xf800
000072  f8ad0002          STRH     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;1363   		font.Space = 0;
000076  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000078  f8ad0006          STRH     r0,[sp,#6]
;;;1364   		x = _pCheckBox->Left;
00007c  8865              LDRH     r5,[r4,#2]
;;;1365   		LCD_DispStr(x + 3, _pCheckBox->Top + 3, "√", &font);
00007e  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
000080  1cd2              ADDS     r2,r2,#3
000082  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
000084  1cea              ADDS     r2,r5,#3
000086  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000088  466b              MOV      r3,sp
00008a  a202              ADR      r2,|L14.148|
00008c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;1366   	}
000090  bf00              NOP      
                  |L14.146|
;;;1367   #else
;;;1368   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
;;;1369   	{
;;;1370   		uint16_t x;
;;;1371   
;;;1372   		RA8875_SetFont(_pCheckBox->Font.FontCode, 0, 0);	/* 设置32点阵字体，行间距=0，字间距=0 */
;;;1373   
;;;1374   		/* 绘制标签 */
;;;1375   		//RA8875_SetBackColor(_pCheckBox->Font.BackColor);
;;;1376   		RA8875_SetBackColor(WIN_BODY_COLOR);
;;;1377   		RA8875_SetFrontColor(_pCheckBox->Font.FrontColor);
;;;1378   		RA8875_DispStr(_pCheckBox->Left, _pCheckBox->Top, _pCheckBox->Caption);
;;;1379   
;;;1380   		/* 绘制外框 */
;;;1381   		x = _pCheckBox->Left + _pCheckBox->Width - CHECK_BOX_W;
;;;1382   		RA8875_DrawRect(x, _pCheckBox->Top, CHECK_BOX_H, CHECK_BOX_W, CHECK_BOX_BORDER_COLOR);
;;;1383   		RA8875_DrawRect(x + 1, _pCheckBox->Top + 1, CHECK_BOX_H - 2, CHECK_BOX_W - 2, CHECK_BOX_BORDER_COLOR);
;;;1384   		RA8875_FillRect(x + 2, _pCheckBox->Top + 2, CHECK_BOX_H - 4, CHECK_BOX_W - 4, CHECK_BOX_BACK_COLOR);
;;;1385   
;;;1386   		if (_pCheckBox->Checked)
;;;1387   		{
;;;1388   			RA8875_SetBackColor(CHECK_BOX_BACK_COLOR);
;;;1389   			RA8875_SetFrontColor(CL_RED);
;;;1390   			RA8875_DispStr(x + 3, _pCheckBox->Top + 3, "√");
;;;1391   		}
;;;1392   	}
;;;1393   	else
;;;1394   	{
;;;1395   
;;;1396   	}
;;;1397   #endif
;;;1398   
;;;1399   }
000092  bd7c              POP      {r2-r6,pc}
;;;1400   
                          ENDP

                  |L14.148|
000094  a1cc00            DCB      161,204,0
000097  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawCircle||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawCircle PROC
;;;877    */
;;;878    void LCD_DrawCircle(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, uint16_t _usRadius, uint16_t _usColor)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;879    {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000006  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000008  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00000a  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;880    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000c  480f              LDR      r0,|L15.76|
00000e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000010  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000012  d106              BNE      |L15.34|
;;;881    	{
;;;882    		RA8875_DrawCircle(_usX, _usY, _usRadius, _usColor);
000014  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000016  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000018  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00001a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DrawCircle
000020  e012              B        |L15.72|
                  |L15.34|
;;;883    	}
;;;884    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
000022  480a              LDR      r0,|L15.76|
000024  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000026  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
00002a  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
00002c  d106              BNE      |L15.60|
;;;885    	{
;;;886    		ILI9488_DrawCircle(_usX, _usY, _usRadius, _usColor);
00002e  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000030  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000032  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000034  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000036  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_DrawCircle
00003a  e005              B        |L15.72|
                  |L15.60|
;;;887    	}
;;;888    	else
;;;889    	{
;;;890    		SPFD5420_DrawCircle(_usX, _usY, _usRadius, _usColor);
00003c  463b              MOV      r3,r7
00003e  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000040  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000042  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000044  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawCircle
                  |L15.72|
;;;891    	}
;;;892    }
000048  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;893    
                          ENDP

                  |L15.76|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawEdit||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawEdit PROC
;;;1408   */
;;;1409   void LCD_DrawEdit(EDIT_T *_pEdit)
000000  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;1410   {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1411   #if 1
;;;1412   	uint16_t len, x, y;
;;;1413   	uint8_t width;
;;;1414   
;;;1415   	/* 仿XP风格，平面编辑框 */
;;;1416   	LCD_DrawRect(_pEdit->Left, _pEdit->Top, _pEdit->Height, _pEdit->Width, EDIT_BORDER_COLOR);
000006  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000008  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00000a  8923              LDRH     r3,[r4,#8]
00000c  88e2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#6]
00000e  88a1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#4]
000010  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
000012  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1417   	LCD_Fill_Rect(_pEdit->Left + 1, _pEdit->Top + 1, _pEdit->Height - 2, _pEdit->Width - 2, EDIT_BACK_COLOR);
000016  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
00001a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00001c  f8b4c008          LDRH     r12,[r4,#8]
000020  f1ac0c02          SUB      r12,r12,#2
000024  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
000028  f8b4c006          LDRH     r12,[r4,#6]
00002c  f1ac0c02          SUB      r12,r12,#2
000030  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
000034  f8b4c004          LDRH     r12,[r4,#4]
000038  f10c0c01          ADD      r12,r12,#1
00003c  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
000040  f8b4c002          LDRH     r12,[r4,#2]
000044  f10c0c01          ADD      r12,r12,#1
000048  fa1ff08c          UXTH     r0,r12
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;1418   
;;;1419   	/* 文字居中 */
;;;1420   	if (_pEdit->Font->FontCode == FC_ST_12)
000050  68e0              LDR      r0,[r4,#0xc]
000052  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]
000054  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000056  d101              BNE      |L16.92|
;;;1421   	{
;;;1422   		width = 6;
000058  2506              MOVS     r5,#6
00005a  e000              B        |L16.94|
                  |L16.92|
;;;1423   	}
;;;1424   	else
;;;1425   	{
;;;1426   		width = 8;
00005c  2508              MOVS     r5,#8
                  |L16.94|
;;;1427   	}
;;;1428   	len = strlen(_pEdit->pCaption);
00005e  6920              LDR      r0,[r4,#0x10]
000060  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
000064  b286              UXTH     r6,r0
;;;1429   	x = _pEdit->Left +  (_pEdit->Width - len * width) / 2;
000066  8921              LDRH     r1,[r4,#8]
000068  fb061015          MLS      r0,r6,r5,r1
00006c  eb0071d0          ADD      r1,r0,r0,LSR #31
000070  8862              LDRH     r2,[r4,#2]
000072  eb020161          ADD      r1,r2,r1,ASR #1
000076  b28f              UXTH     r7,r1
;;;1430   	y = _pEdit->Top + _pEdit->Height / 2 - width;
000078  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
00007a  eb0071d0          ADD      r1,r0,r0,LSR #31
00007e  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
000080  eb020161          ADD      r1,r2,r1,ASR #1
000084  1b49              SUBS     r1,r1,r5
000086  fa1ff881          UXTH     r8,r1
;;;1431   
;;;1432   	LCD_DispStr(x, y, _pEdit->pCaption, _pEdit->Font);
00008a  4641              MOV      r1,r8
00008c  4638              MOV      r0,r7
00008e  e9d43203          LDRD     r3,r2,[r4,#0xc]
000092  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;1433   #else
;;;1434   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
;;;1435   	{
;;;1436   		uint16_t len, x;
;;;1437   
;;;1438   		/* 仿XP风格，平面编辑框 */
;;;1439   		RA8875_DrawRect(_pEdit->Left, _pEdit->Top, _pEdit->Height, _pEdit->Width, EDIT_BORDER_COLOR);
;;;1440   		RA8875_FillRect(_pEdit->Left + 1, _pEdit->Top + 1, _pEdit->Height - 2, _pEdit->Width - 2, EDIT_BACK_COLOR);
;;;1441   
;;;1442   		RA8875_SetFont(_pEdit->Font.FontCode, 0, 0);	/* 设置32点阵字体，行间距=0，字间距=0 */
;;;1443   		RA8875_SetFrontColor(_pEdit->Font.FrontColor);
;;;1444   		RA8875_SetBackColor(EDIT_BACK_COLOR);
;;;1445   
;;;1446   		/* 文字居中 */
;;;1447   		len = strlen(_pEdit->Caption);
;;;1448   		x = (_pEdit->Width - len * 16) / 2;
;;;1449   
;;;1450   		RA8875_DispStr(_pEdit->Left + x, _pEdit->Top + 3, _pEdit->Caption);
;;;1451   	}
;;;1452   	else
;;;1453   	{
;;;1454   		//SPFD5420_DrawCircle(_usX, _usY, _usRadius, _usColor);
;;;1455   	}
;;;1456   #endif
;;;1457   }
000096  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;1458   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawGroupBox||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawGroupBox PROC
;;;1607   */
;;;1608   void LCD_DrawGroupBox(GROUP_T *_pBox)
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;1609   {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1610   	uint16_t x, y;
;;;1611   
;;;1612   	/* 画阴影线 */
;;;1613   	LCD_DrawRect(_pBox->Left + 1, _pBox->Top + 5, _pBox->Height, _pBox->Width - 1, CL_BOX_BORDER2);
000004  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000008  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00000a  8927              LDRH     r7,[r4,#8]
00000c  1e7f              SUBS     r7,r7,#1
00000e  b2bb              UXTH     r3,r7
000010  88e2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#6]
000012  88a7              LDRH     r7,[r4,#4]
000014  1d7f              ADDS     r7,r7,#5
000016  b2b9              UXTH     r1,r7
000018  8867              LDRH     r7,[r4,#2]
00001a  1c7f              ADDS     r7,r7,#1
00001c  b2b8              UXTH     r0,r7
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1614   
;;;1615   	/* 画主框线 */
;;;1616   	LCD_DrawRect(_pBox->Left, _pBox->Top + 4, _pBox->Height, _pBox->Width - 1, CL_BOX_BORDER1);
000022  f64a5053          MOV      r0,#0xad53
000026  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000028  8927              LDRH     r7,[r4,#8]
00002a  1e7f              SUBS     r7,r7,#1
00002c  b2bb              UXTH     r3,r7
00002e  88e2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#6]
000030  88a7              LDRH     r7,[r4,#4]
000032  1d3f              ADDS     r7,r7,#4
000034  b2b9              UXTH     r1,r7
000036  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
000038  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;1617   
;;;1618   	/* 显示分组框标题（文字在左上角） */
;;;1619   	x = _pBox->Left + 9;
00003c  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
00003e  3009              ADDS     r0,r0,#9
000040  b285              UXTH     r5,r0
;;;1620   	y = _pBox->Top;
000042  88a6              LDRH     r6,[r4,#4]
;;;1621   	LCD_DispStr(x, y, _pBox->pCaption, _pBox->Font);
000044  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000046  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000048  e9d43203          LDRD     r3,r2,[r4,#0xc]
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;1622   }
000050  bdf8              POP      {r3-r7,pc}
;;;1623   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawHColorLine||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawHColorLine PROC
;;;2078   */
;;;2079   void LCD_DrawHColorLine(uint16_t _usX1 , uint16_t _usY1, uint16_t _usWidth, uint16_t *_pColor)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;2080   {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000006  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000008  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00000a  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;2081   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000c  4809              LDR      r0,|L18.52|
00000e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000010  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000012  d106              BNE      |L18.34|
;;;2082   	{
;;;2083   		RA8875_DrawHColorLine(_usX1, _usY1, _usWidth, _pColor);
000014  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000016  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000018  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00001a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DrawHColorLine
000020  e005              B        |L18.46|
                  |L18.34|
;;;2084   	}
;;;2085   	else
;;;2086   	{
;;;2087   		SPFD5420_DrawHColorLine(_usX1, _usY1, _usWidth, _pColor);
000022  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000024  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000026  4629              MOV      r1,r5
