000028  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawHColorLine
                  |L18.46|
;;;2088   	}
;;;2089   }
00002e  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;2090   
                          ENDP

000032  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L18.52|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawIcon||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawIcon PROC
;;;990    */
;;;991    void LCD_DrawIcon(const ICON_T *_tIcon, FONT_T *_tFont, uint8_t _ucFocusMode)
000000  e92d4ff7          PUSH     {r0-r2,r4-r11,lr}
;;;992    {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
;;;993    	const uint16_t *p;
;;;994    	uint16_t usNewRGB;
;;;995    	uint16_t x, y;		/* 用于记录窗口内的相对坐标 */
;;;996    
;;;997    	p = _tIcon->pBmp;
000008  f8d4a00c          LDR      r10,[r4,#0xc]
;;;998    	for (y = 0; y < _tIcon->Height; y++)
00000c  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
00000e  e0ad              B        |L19.364|
                  |L19.16|
;;;999    	{
;;;1000   		for (x = 0; x < _tIcon->Width; x++)
000010  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
000012  e0a5              B        |L19.352|
                  |L19.20|
;;;1001   		{
;;;1002   			usNewRGB = *p++;	/* 读取图标的颜色值后指针加1 */
000014  f83a8b02          LDRH     r8,[r10],#2
;;;1003   			/* 将图标的4个直角切割为弧角，弧角外是背景图标 */
;;;1004   			if ((y == 0 && (x < 6 || x > _tIcon->Width - 7)) ||
000018  b92e              CBNZ     r6,|L19.38|
00001a  2d06              CMP      r5,#6
                  |L19.28|
00001c  db77              BLT      |L19.270|
00001e  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000020  1fc0              SUBS     r0,r0,#7
000022  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000024  dbfa              BLT      |L19.28|
                  |L19.38|
;;;1005   				(y == 1 && (x < 4 || x > _tIcon->Width - 5)) ||
000026  2e01              CMP      r6,#1
000028  d105              BNE      |L19.54|
00002a  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
00002c  dbf6              BLT      |L19.28|
00002e  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000030  1f40              SUBS     r0,r0,#5
000032  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000034  dbf2              BLT      |L19.28|
                  |L19.54|
;;;1006   				(y == 2 && (x < 3 || x > _tIcon->Width - 4)) ||
000036  2e02              CMP      r6,#2
000038  d105              BNE      |L19.70|
00003a  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
00003c  dbee              BLT      |L19.28|
00003e  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000040  1f00              SUBS     r0,r0,#4
000042  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000044  dbea              BLT      |L19.28|
                  |L19.70|
;;;1007   				(y == 3 && (x < 2 || x > _tIcon->Width - 3)) ||
000046  2e03              CMP      r6,#3
000048  d105              BNE      |L19.86|
00004a  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
00004c  dbe6              BLT      |L19.28|
00004e  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000050  1ec0              SUBS     r0,r0,#3
000052  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000054  dbe2              BLT      |L19.28|
                  |L19.86|
;;;1008   				(y == 4 && (x < 1 || x > _tIcon->Width - 2)) ||
000056  2e04              CMP      r6,#4
000058  d105              BNE      |L19.102|
00005a  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
00005c  db7e              BLT      |L19.348|
00005e  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000060  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
000062  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000064  db7a              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.102|
;;;1009   				(y == 5 && (x < 1 || x > _tIcon->Width - 2))	||
000066  2e05              CMP      r6,#5
000068  d105              BNE      |L19.118|
00006a  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
00006c  db76              BLT      |L19.348|
00006e  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000070  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
000072  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000074  db72              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.118|
;;;1010   
;;;1011   				(y == _tIcon->Height - 1 && (x < 6 || x > _tIcon->Width - 7)) ||
000076  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
000078  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00007a  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
00007c  d105              BNE      |L19.138|
00007e  2d06              CMP      r5,#6
000080  db6c              BLT      |L19.348|
000082  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000084  1fc0              SUBS     r0,r0,#7
000086  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
000088  db68              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.138|
;;;1012   				(y == _tIcon->Height - 2 && (x < 4 || x > _tIcon->Width - 5)) ||
00008a  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
00008c  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
00008e  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
000090  d105              BNE      |L19.158|
000092  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
000094  db62              BLT      |L19.348|
000096  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
000098  1f40              SUBS     r0,r0,#5
00009a  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
00009c  db5e              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.158|
;;;1013   				(y == _tIcon->Height - 3 && (x < 3 || x > _tIcon->Width - 4)) ||
00009e  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
0000a0  1ec0              SUBS     r0,r0,#3
0000a2  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
0000a4  d105              BNE      |L19.178|
0000a6  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
0000a8  db58              BLT      |L19.348|
0000aa  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
0000ac  1f00              SUBS     r0,r0,#4
0000ae  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
0000b0  db54              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.178|
;;;1014   				(y == _tIcon->Height - 4 && (x < 2 || x > _tIcon->Width - 3)) ||
0000b2  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
0000b4  1f00              SUBS     r0,r0,#4
0000b6  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
0000b8  d105              BNE      |L19.198|
0000ba  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
0000bc  db4e              BLT      |L19.348|
0000be  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
0000c0  1ec0              SUBS     r0,r0,#3
0000c2  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
0000c4  db4a              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.198|
;;;1015   				(y == _tIcon->Height - 5 && (x < 1 || x > _tIcon->Width - 2)) ||
0000c6  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
0000c8  1f40              SUBS     r0,r0,#5
0000ca  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
0000cc  d105              BNE      |L19.218|
0000ce  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
0000d0  db44              BLT      |L19.348|
0000d2  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
0000d4  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
0000d6  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
0000d8  db40              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.218|
;;;1016   				(y == _tIcon->Height - 6 && (x < 1 || x > _tIcon->Width - 2))
0000da  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
0000dc  1f80              SUBS     r0,r0,#6
0000de  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
0000e0  d105              BNE      |L19.238|
0000e2  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
0000e4  db3a              BLT      |L19.348|
0000e6  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]
0000e8  1e80              SUBS     r0,r0,#2
0000ea  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
0000ec  db36              BLT      |L19.348|
                  |L19.238|
;;;1017   				)
;;;1018   			{
;;;1019   				;
;;;1020   			}
;;;1021   			else
;;;1022   			{
;;;1023   				if (_ucFocusMode != 0)	/* 1表示选中的图标 */
0000ee  9802              LDR      r0,[sp,#8]
0000f0  b358              CBZ      r0,|L19.330|
;;;1024   				{
;;;1025   					/* 降低原始像素的亮度，实现图标被激活选中的效果 */
;;;1026   					uint16_t R,G,B;
;;;1027   					uint16_t bright = 15;
0000f2  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
;;;1028   
;;;1029   					/* rrrr rggg gggb bbbb */
;;;1030   					R = (usNewRGB & 0xF800) >> 11;
0000f4  ea4f21d8          LSR      r1,r8,#11
;;;1031   					G = (usNewRGB & 0x07E0) >> 5;
0000f8  f3c81245          UBFX     r2,r8,#5,#6
;;;1032   					B =  usNewRGB & 0x001F;
0000fc  f008031f          AND      r3,r8,#0x1f
;;;1033   					if (R > bright)
000100  4281              CMP      r1,r0
000102  dd05              BLE      |L19.272|
;;;1034   					{
;;;1035   						R -= bright;
000104  eba10c00          SUB      r12,r1,r0
000108  fa1ff18c          UXTH     r1,r12
00010c  e001              B        |L19.274|
                  |L19.270|
00010e  e025              B        |L19.348|
                  |L19.272|
;;;1036   					}
;;;1037   					else
;;;1038   					{
;;;1039   						R = 0;
000110  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
                  |L19.274|
;;;1040   					}
;;;1041   					if (G > 2 * bright)
000112  ea4f0c40          LSL      r12,r0,#1
000116  4594              CMP      r12,r2
000118  da06              BGE      |L19.296|
;;;1042   					{
;;;1043   						G -= 2 * bright;
00011a  f04f0c02          MOV      r12,#2
00011e  fb0c2c10          MLS      r12,r12,r0,r2
000122  fa1ff28c          UXTH     r2,r12
000126  e000              B        |L19.298|
                  |L19.296|
;;;1044   					}
;;;1045   					else
;;;1046   					{
;;;1047   						G = 0;
000128  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
                  |L19.298|
;;;1048   					}
;;;1049   					if (B > bright)
00012a  4283              CMP      r3,r0
00012c  dd04              BLE      |L19.312|
;;;1050   					{
;;;1051   						B -= bright;
00012e  eba30c00          SUB      r12,r3,r0
000132  fa1ff38c          UXTH     r3,r12
000136  e000              B        |L19.314|
                  |L19.312|
;;;1052   					}
;;;1053   					else
;;;1054   					{
;;;1055   						B = 0;
000138  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
                  |L19.314|
;;;1056   					}
;;;1057   					usNewRGB = (R << 11) + (G << 5) + B;
00013a  ea4f2cc1          LSL      r12,r1,#11
00013e  eb0c1c42          ADD      r12,r12,r2,LSL #5
000142  449c              ADD      r12,r12,r3
000144  fa1ff88c          UXTH     r8,r12
;;;1058   				}
000148  bf00              NOP      
                  |L19.330|
;;;1059   
;;;1060   				LCD_PutPixel(x + _tIcon->Left, y + _tIcon->Top, usNewRGB);
00014a  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
00014c  4432              ADD      r2,r2,r6
00014e  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
000150  8862              LDRH     r2,[r4,#2]
000152  442a              ADD      r2,r2,r5
000154  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000156  4642              MOV      r2,r8
000158  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
                  |L19.348|
00015c  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;1000
00015e  b285              UXTH     r5,r0                 ;1000
                  |L19.352|
000160  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]            ;1000
000162  42a8              CMP      r0,r5                 ;1000
000164  f73faf56          BGT      |L19.20|
000168  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1              ;998
00016a  b286              UXTH     r6,r0                 ;998
                  |L19.364|
00016c  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]            ;998
00016e  42b0              CMP      r0,r6                 ;998
000170  f73faf4e          BGT      |L19.16|
;;;1061   			}
;;;1062   		}
;;;1063   	}
;;;1064   
;;;1065   	/* 绘制图标下的文字 */
;;;1066   	{
;;;1067   		uint16_t len;
;;;1068   		uint16_t width;
;;;1069   
;;;1070   		len = strlen(_tIcon->Text);
000174  f1040010          ADD      r0,r4,#0x10
000178  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
00017c  fa1ffb80          UXTH     r11,r0
;;;1071   
;;;1072   		if  (len == 0)
000180  f1bb0f00          CMP      r11,#0
000184  d101              BNE      |L19.394|
                  |L19.390|
;;;1073   		{
;;;1074   			return;	/* 如果图标文本长度为0，则不显示 */
;;;1075   		}
;;;1076   
;;;1077   		/* 计算文本的总宽度 */
;;;1078   		if (_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_12)		/* 12点阵 */
;;;1079   		{
;;;1080   			width = 6 * (len + _tFont->Space);
;;;1081   		}
;;;1082   		else	/* FC_ST_16 */
;;;1083   		{
;;;1084   			width = 8 * (len + _tFont->Space);
;;;1085   		}
;;;1086   
;;;1087   
;;;1088   		/* 水平居中 */
;;;1089   		x = (_tIcon->Left + _tIcon->Width / 2) - width / 2;
;;;1090   		y = _tIcon->Top + _tIcon->Height + 2;
;;;1091   		LCD_DispStr(x, y, (char *)_tIcon->Text, _tFont);
;;;1092   	}
;;;1093   }
000186  e8bd8ffe          POP      {r1-r11,pc}
                  |L19.394|
00018a  8838              LDRH     r0,[r7,#0]            ;1078
00018c  2801              CMP      r0,#1                 ;1078
00018e  d107              BNE      |L19.416|
000190  88f8              LDRH     r0,[r7,#6]            ;1080
000192  4458              ADD      r0,r0,r11             ;1080
000194  eb000040          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #1       ;1080
000198  0440              LSLS     r0,r0,#17             ;1080
00019a  ea4f4910          LSR      r9,r0,#16             ;1080
00019e  e004              B        |L19.426|
                  |L19.416|
0001a0  88f8              LDRH     r0,[r7,#6]            ;1084
0001a2  4458              ADD      r0,r0,r11             ;1084
0001a4  04c0              LSLS     r0,r0,#19             ;1084
0001a6  ea4f4910          LSR      r9,r0,#16             ;1084
                  |L19.426|
0001aa  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]            ;1089
0001ac  eb0072d0          ADD      r2,r0,r0,LSR #31      ;1089
0001b0  8863              LDRH     r3,[r4,#2]            ;1089
0001b2  eb030262          ADD      r2,r3,r2,ASR #1       ;1089
0001b6  4649              MOV      r1,r9                 ;1089
0001b8  eb0973d1          ADD      r3,r9,r1,LSR #31      ;1089
0001bc  eba20263          SUB      r2,r2,r3,ASR #1       ;1089
0001c0  b295              UXTH     r5,r2                 ;1089
0001c2  88a0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#4]            ;1090
0001c4  88e1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#6]            ;1090
0001c6  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1              ;1090
0001c8  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2              ;1090
0001ca  b286              UXTH     r6,r0                 ;1090
0001cc  463b              MOV      r3,r7                 ;1091
0001ce  f1040210          ADD      r2,r4,#0x10           ;1091
0001d2  4631              MOV      r1,r6                 ;1091
0001d4  4628              MOV      r0,r5                 ;1091
0001d6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
0001da  bf00              NOP      
0001dc  e7d3              B        |L19.390|
;;;1094   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawIcon32||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawIcon32 PROC
;;;1125   */
;;;1126   void LCD_DrawIcon32(const ICON_T *_tIcon, FONT_T *_tFont, uint8_t _ucFocusMode)
000000  e92d4ff7          PUSH     {r0-r2,r4-r11,lr}
;;;1127   {
000004  b088              SUB      sp,sp,#0x20
000006  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000008  4689              MOV      r9,r1
;;;1128   	const uint8_t *p;
;;;1129   	uint16_t usOldRGB, usNewRGB;
;;;1130   	int16_t x, y;		/* 用于记录窗口内的相对坐标 */
;;;1131   	uint8_t R1,G1,B1,A;	/* 新像素色彩分量 */
;;;1132   	uint8_t R0,G0,B0;	/* 旧像素色彩分量 */
;;;1133   
;;;1134   	p = (const uint8_t *)_tIcon->pBmp;
00000a  68e5              LDR      r5,[r4,#0xc]
;;;1135   	p += 54;		/* 直接指向图像数据区 */
00000c  3536              ADDS     r5,r5,#0x36
;;;1136   
;;;1137   	/* 按照BMP位图次序，从左至右，从上至下扫描 */
;;;1138   	for (y = _tIcon->Height - 1; y >= 0; y--)
00000e  88e0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#6]
000010  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000012  fa0ff880          SXTH     r8,r0
000016  e099              B        |L20.332|
                  |L20.24|
;;;1139   	{
;;;1140   		for (x = 0; x < _tIcon->Width; x++)
000018  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
00001a  e08f              B        |L20.316|
                  |L20.28|
;;;1141   		{
;;;1142   			B1 = *p++;
00001c  f8150b01          LDRB     r0,[r5],#1
000020  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;1143   			G1 = *p++;
000022  f8150b01          LDRB     r0,[r5],#1
000026  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;1144   			R1 = *p++;
000028  f8150b01          LDRB     r0,[r5],#1
00002c  9006              STR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
;;;1145   			A = *p++;	/* Alpha 值(透明度)，0-255, 0表示透明，1表示不透明, 中间值表示透明度 */
00002e  f8156b01          LDRB     r6,[r5],#1
;;;1146   
;;;1147   			if (A == 0x00)	/* 需要透明,显示背景 */
000032  2e00              CMP      r6,#0
000034  d01f              BEQ      |L20.118|
;;;1148   			{
;;;1149   				;	/* 不用刷新背景 */
;;;1150   			}
;;;1151   			else if (A == 0xFF)	/* 完全不透明， 显示新像素 */
000036  2eff              CMP      r6,#0xff
000038  d11e              BNE      |L20.120|
;;;1152   			{
;;;1153   				usNewRGB = RGB(R1, G1, B1);
00003a  9806              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
00003c  10c0              ASRS     r0,r0,#3
00003e  02c1              LSLS     r1,r0,#11
000040  9805              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
000042  1080              ASRS     r0,r0,#2
000044  ea411140          ORR      r1,r1,r0,LSL #5
000048  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
00004a  ea4100e0          ORR      r0,r1,r0,ASR #3
00004e  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
;;;1154   				if (_ucFocusMode == 1)
000050  980a              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x28]
000052  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000054  d106              BNE      |L20.100|
;;;1155   				{
;;;1156   					usNewRGB = LCD_Blend565(usNewRGB, CL_YELLOW, 10);
000056  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
000058  f64f71e0          MOV      r1,#0xffe0
00005c  9807              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
00005e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Blend565
000062  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
                  |L20.100|
;;;1157   				}
;;;1158   				LCD_PutPixel(x + _tIcon->Left, y + _tIcon->Top, usNewRGB);
000064  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
000066  4442              ADD      r2,r2,r8
000068  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
00006a  8862              LDRH     r2,[r4,#2]
00006c  443a              ADD      r2,r2,r7
00006e  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000070  9a07              LDR      r2,[sp,#0x1c]
000072  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
                  |L20.118|
000076  e05f              B        |L20.312|
                  |L20.120|
;;;1159   			}
;;;1160   			else 	/* 半透明 */
;;;1161   			{
;;;1162   				/* 计算公式： 实际显示颜色 = 前景颜色 * Alpha / 255 + 背景颜色 * (255-Alpha) / 255 */
;;;1163   				usOldRGB = LCD_GetPixel(x + _tIcon->Left, y + _tIcon->Top);
000078  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
00007a  4442              ADD      r2,r2,r8
00007c  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
00007e  8862              LDRH     r2,[r4,#2]
000080  443a              ADD      r2,r2,r7
000082  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000084  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_GetPixel
000088  4682              MOV      r10,r0
;;;1164   				//usOldRGB = 0xFFFF;
;;;1165   				R0 = RGB565_R(usOldRGB);
00008a  21f8              MOVS     r1,#0xf8
00008c  ea01202a          AND      r0,r1,r10,ASR #8
000090  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1166   				G0 = RGB565_G(usOldRGB);
000092  21fc              MOVS     r1,#0xfc
000094  ea0100ea          AND      r0,r1,r10,ASR #3
000098  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
;;;1167   				B0 = RGB565_B(usOldRGB);
00009a  21f8              MOVS     r1,#0xf8
00009c  ea0100ca          AND      r0,r1,r10,LSL #3
0000a0  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
;;;1168   
;;;1169   				R1 = (R1 * A) / 255 + R0 * (255 - A) / 255;
0000a2  9806              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
0000a4  4370              MULS     r0,r6,r0
0000a6  21ff              MOVS     r1,#0xff
0000a8  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
0000ac  f1c601ff          RSB      r1,r6,#0xff
0000b0  9803              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
0000b2  4341              MULS     r1,r0,r1
0000b4  20ff              MOVS     r0,#0xff
0000b6  fb91f0f0          SDIV     r0,r1,r0
0000ba  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0000bc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000be  9006              STR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
;;;1170   				G1 = (G1 * A) / 255 + G0 * (255 - A) / 255;
0000c0  9805              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
0000c2  4370              MULS     r0,r6,r0
0000c4  21ff              MOVS     r1,#0xff
0000c6  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
0000ca  f1c601ff          RSB      r1,r6,#0xff
0000ce  9802              LDR      r0,[sp,#8]
0000d0  4341              MULS     r1,r0,r1
0000d2  20ff              MOVS     r0,#0xff
0000d4  fb91f0f0          SDIV     r0,r1,r0
0000d8  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0000da  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000dc  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;1171   				B1 = (B1 * A) / 255 + B0 * (255 - A) / 255;
0000de  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
0000e0  4370              MULS     r0,r6,r0
0000e2  21ff              MOVS     r1,#0xff
0000e4  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
0000e8  f1c601ff          RSB      r1,r6,#0xff
0000ec  9801              LDR      r0,[sp,#4]
0000ee  4341              MULS     r1,r0,r1
0000f0  20ff              MOVS     r0,#0xff
0000f2  fb91f0f0          SDIV     r0,r1,r0
0000f6  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0000f8  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000fa  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;1172   				usNewRGB = RGB(R1, G1, B1);
0000fc  9806              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
0000fe  10c0              ASRS     r0,r0,#3
000100  02c1              LSLS     r1,r0,#11
000102  9805              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
000104  1080              ASRS     r0,r0,#2
000106  ea411140          ORR      r1,r1,r0,LSL #5
00010a  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
00010c  ea4100e0          ORR      r0,r1,r0,ASR #3
000110  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
;;;1173   				if (_ucFocusMode == 1)
000112  980a              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x28]
000114  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000116  d106              BNE      |L20.294|
;;;1174   				{
;;;1175   					usNewRGB = LCD_Blend565(usNewRGB, CL_YELLOW, 10);
000118  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
00011a  f64f71e0          MOV      r1,#0xffe0
00011e  9807              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
000120  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Blend565
000124  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
                  |L20.294|
;;;1176   				}
;;;1177   				LCD_PutPixel(x + _tIcon->Left, y + _tIcon->Top, usNewRGB);
000126  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
000128  4442              ADD      r2,r2,r8
00012a  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
00012c  8862              LDRH     r2,[r4,#2]
00012e  443a              ADD      r2,r2,r7
000130  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000132  9a07              LDR      r2,[sp,#0x1c]
000134  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_PutPixel
                  |L20.312|
000138  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1              ;1140
00013a  b207              SXTH     r7,r0                 ;1140
                  |L20.316|
00013c  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]            ;1140
00013e  42b8              CMP      r0,r7                 ;1140
000140  f73faf6c          BGT      |L20.28|
000144  f1a80001          SUB      r0,r8,#1              ;1138
000148  fa0ff880          SXTH     r8,r0                 ;1138
                  |L20.332|
00014c  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0                 ;1138
000150  f6bfaf62          BGE      |L20.24|
;;;1178   			}
;;;1179   		}
;;;1180   	}
;;;1181   
;;;1182   	/* 绘制图标下的文字 */
;;;1183   	{
;;;1184   		uint16_t len;
;;;1185   		uint16_t width;
;;;1186   
;;;1187   		len = strlen(_tIcon->Text);
000154  f1040010          ADD      r0,r4,#0x10
000158  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
00015c  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
00015e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
;;;1188   
;;;1189   		if  (len == 0)
000160  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]
000162  b910              CBNZ     r0,|L20.362|
                  |L20.356|
;;;1190   		{
;;;1191   			return;	/* 如果图标文本长度为0，则不显示 */
;;;1192   		}
;;;1193   
;;;1194   		/* 计算文本的总宽度 */
;;;1195   		if (_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_12)		/* 12点阵 */
;;;1196   		{
;;;1197   			width = 6 * (len + _tFont->Space);
;;;1198   		}
;;;1199   		else	/* FC_ST_16 */
;;;1200   		{
;;;1201   			width = 8 * (len + _tFont->Space);
;;;1202   		}
;;;1203   
;;;1204   
;;;1205   		/* 水平居中 */
;;;1206   		x = (_tIcon->Left + _tIcon->Width / 2) - width / 2;
;;;1207   		y = _tIcon->Top + _tIcon->Height + 2;
;;;1208   		LCD_DispStr(x, y, (char *)_tIcon->Text, _tFont);
;;;1209   	}
;;;1210   }
000164  b00b              ADD      sp,sp,#0x2c
000166  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L20.362|
00016a  f8b90000          LDRH     r0,[r9,#0]            ;1195
00016e  2801              CMP      r0,#1                 ;1195
000170  d109              BNE      |L20.390|
000172  f8b91006          LDRH     r1,[r9,#6]            ;1197
000176  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;1197
000178  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1              ;1197
00017a  eb000040          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #1       ;1197
00017e  0440              LSLS     r0,r0,#17             ;1197
000180  ea4f4b10          LSR      r11,r0,#16            ;1197
000184  e006              B        |L20.404|
                  |L20.390|
000186  f8b91006          LDRH     r1,[r9,#6]            ;1201
00018a  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;1201
00018c  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1              ;1201
00018e  04c0              LSLS     r0,r0,#19             ;1201
000190  ea4f4b10          LSR      r11,r0,#16            ;1201
                  |L20.404|
000194  8920              LDRH     r0,[r4,#8]            ;1206
000196  eb0072d0          ADD      r2,r0,r0,LSR #31      ;1206
00019a  8863              LDRH     r3,[r4,#2]            ;1206
00019c  eb030262          ADD      r2,r3,r2,ASR #1       ;1206
0001a0  4659              MOV      r1,r11                ;1206
0001a2  eb0b73d1          ADD      r3,r11,r1,LSR #31     ;1206
0001a6  eba20263          SUB      r2,r2,r3,ASR #1       ;1206
0001aa  b217              SXTH     r7,r2                 ;1206
0001ac  88a0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#4]            ;1207
0001ae  88e1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#6]            ;1207
0001b0  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1              ;1207
0001b2  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2              ;1207
0001b4  fa0ff880          SXTH     r8,r0                 ;1207
0001b8  fa1ff188          UXTH     r1,r8                 ;1208
0001bc  b2b8              UXTH     r0,r7                 ;1208
0001be  464b              MOV      r3,r9                 ;1208
0001c0  f1040210          ADD      r2,r4,#0x10           ;1208
0001c4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
0001c8  bf00              NOP      
0001ca  e7cb              B        |L20.356|
;;;1211   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawLabel||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawLabel PROC
;;;1285   */
;;;1286   void LCD_DrawLabel(LABEL_T *_pLabel)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1287   {
000002  b0c1              SUB      sp,sp,#0x104
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1288   #if 1
;;;1289   	char dispbuf[256];
;;;1290   	uint16_t i;
;;;1291   	uint16_t NewLen;
;;;1292   
;;;1293   	NewLen = strlen(_pLabel->pCaption);
000006  6920              LDR      r0,[r4,#0x10]
000008  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
00000c  b286              UXTH     r6,r0
;;;1294   
;;;1295   	if (NewLen > _pLabel->MaxLen)
00000e  8960              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0xa]
000010  42b0              CMP      r0,r6
000012  da07              BGE      |L21.36|
;;;1296   	{
;;;1297   		LCD_DispStr(_pLabel->Left, _pLabel->Top, _pLabel->pCaption, _pLabel->Font);
000014  88a1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#4]
000016  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
000018  e9d43203          LDRD     r3,r2,[r4,#0xc]
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;1298   		_pLabel->MaxLen = NewLen;
000020  8166              STRH     r6,[r4,#0xa]
000022  e01b              B        |L21.92|
                  |L21.36|
;;;1299   	}
;;;1300   	else
;;;1301   	{
;;;1302   		for (i = 0; i < NewLen; i++)
000024  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
000026  e005              B        |L21.52|
                  |L21.40|
;;;1303   		{
;;;1304   			dispbuf[i] = _pLabel->pCaption[i];
000028  6920              LDR      r0,[r4,#0x10]
00002a  5d40              LDRB     r0,[r0,r5]
00002c  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
00002e  5548              STRB     r0,[r1,r5]
000030  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;1302
000032  b285              UXTH     r5,r0                 ;1302
                  |L21.52|
000034  42b5              CMP      r5,r6                 ;1302
000036  dbf7              BLT      |L21.40|
;;;1305   		}
;;;1306   		for (; i < _pLabel->MaxLen; i++)
000038  e004              B        |L21.68|
                  |L21.58|
;;;1307   		{
;;;1308   			dispbuf[i] = ' ';		/* 末尾填充空格 */
00003a  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
00003c  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
00003e  5548              STRB     r0,[r1,r5]
000040  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;1306
000042  b285              UXTH     r5,r0                 ;1306
                  |L21.68|
000044  8960              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0xa]          ;1306
000046  42a8              CMP      r0,r5                 ;1306
000048  dcf7              BGT      |L21.58|
;;;1309   		}
;;;1310   		dispbuf[i] = 0;
00004a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00004c  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
00004e  5548              STRB     r0,[r1,r5]
;;;1311   		LCD_DispStr(_pLabel->Left, _pLabel->Top, dispbuf, _pLabel->Font);
000050  88a1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#4]
000052  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
000054  aa01              ADD      r2,sp,#4
000056  68e3              LDR      r3,[r4,#0xc]
000058  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
                  |L21.92|
;;;1312   	}
;;;1313   #else
;;;1314   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
;;;1315   	{
;;;1316   		RA8875_SetFont(_pLabel->Font->FontCode, 0, 0);	/* 设置32点阵字体，行间距=0，字间距=0 */
;;;1317   
;;;1318   		RA8875_SetBackColor(_pLabel->Font->BackColor);
;;;1319   		RA8875_SetFrontColor(_pLabel->Font->FrontColor);
;;;1320   
;;;1321   		RA8875_DispStr(_pLabel->Left, _pLabel->Top, _pLabel->Caption);
;;;1322   	}
;;;1323   	else
;;;1324   	{
;;;1325   
;;;1326   	}
;;;1327   #endif
;;;1328   }
00005c  b041              ADD      sp,sp,#0x104
00005e  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1329   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawLine||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawLine PROC
;;;773    */
;;;774    void LCD_DrawLine(uint16_t _usX1 , uint16_t _usY1 , uint16_t _usX2 , uint16_t _usY2 , uint16_t _usColor)
000000  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;775    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000008  4617              MOV      r7,r2
00000a  4698              MOV      r8,r3
00000c  9c08              LDR      r4,[sp,#0x20]
;;;776    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000e  4811              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
000010  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000012  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000014  d107              BNE      |L22.38|
;;;777    	{
;;;778    		RA8875_DrawLine(_usX1 , _usY1 , _usX2, _usY2 , _usColor);
000016  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000018  463a              MOV      r2,r7
00001a  4631              MOV      r1,r6
00001c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00001e  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
000020  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DrawLine
000024  e014              B        |L22.80|
                  |L22.38|
;;;779    	}
;;;780    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
000026  480b              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
000028  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00002a  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
00002e  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
000030  d107              BNE      |L22.66|
;;;781    	{
;;;782    		ILI9488_DrawLine(_usX1 , _usY1 , _usX2, _usY2 , _usColor);
000032  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000034  463a              MOV      r2,r7
000036  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000038  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00003a  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
00003c  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_DrawLine
000040  e006              B        |L22.80|
                  |L22.66|
;;;783    	}
;;;784    	else
;;;785    	{
;;;786    		SPFD5420_DrawLine(_usX1 , _usY1 , _usX2, _usY2 , _usColor);
000042  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000044  463a              MOV      r2,r7
000046  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000048  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00004a  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawLine
                  |L22.80|
;;;787    	}
;;;788    }
000050  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;789    
                          ENDP

                  |L22.84|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawLineH||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawLineH PROC
;;;2123   */
;;;2124   void LCD_DrawLineH(uint16_t _usX1 , uint16_t _usY1 , uint16_t _usX2, uint16_t _usColor)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;2125   {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000006  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000008  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00000a  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;2126   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000c  4809              LDR      r0,|L23.52|
00000e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000010  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000012  d106              BNE      |L23.34|
;;;2127   	{
;;;2128   		RA8875_DrawHLine(_usX1, _usY1, _usX2, _usColor);
000014  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000016  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000018  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00001a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DrawHLine
000020  e005              B        |L23.46|
                  |L23.34|
;;;2129   	}
;;;2130   	else
;;;2131   	{
;;;2132   		SPFD5420_DrawHLine(_usX1, _usY1, _usX2, _usColor);
000022  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000024  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000026  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000028  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawHLine
                  |L23.46|
;;;2133   	}
;;;2134   }
00002e  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;2135   
                          ENDP

000032  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L23.52|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawLineV||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawLineV PROC
;;;2101   */
;;;2102   void LCD_DrawLineV(uint16_t _usX1 , uint16_t _usY1 , uint16_t _usY2, uint16_t _usColor)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;2103   {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000006  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000008  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00000a  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;2104   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000c  4809              LDR      r0,|L24.52|
00000e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000010  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000012  d106              BNE      |L24.34|
;;;2105   	{
;;;2106   		RA8875_DrawVLine(_usX1 , _usY1 , _usY2 , _usColor);
000014  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000016  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000018  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00001a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DrawVLine
000020  e005              B        |L24.46|
                  |L24.34|
;;;2107   	}
;;;2108   	else
;;;2109   	{
;;;2110   		SPFD5420_DrawVLine(_usX1 , _usY1 , _usY2, _usColor);
000022  463b              MOV      r3,r7
000024  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000026  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000028  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawVLine
                  |L24.46|
;;;2111   	}
;;;2112   }
00002e  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;2113   /*
                          ENDP

000032  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L24.52|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawPoints||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawPoints PROC
;;;799    */
;;;800    void LCD_DrawPoints(uint16_t *x, uint16_t *y, uint16_t _usSize, uint16_t _usColor)
000000  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;801    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000008  4617              MOV      r7,r2
00000a  4698              MOV      r8,r3
;;;802    	uint16_t i;
;;;803    
;;;804    	for (i = 0 ; i < _usSize - 1; i++)
00000c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00000e  e00f              B        |L25.48|
                  |L25.16|
;;;805    	{
;;;806    		LCD_DrawLine(x[i], y[i], x[i + 1], y[i + 1], _usColor);
000010  f1040c01          ADD      r12,r4,#1
000014  f8cd8000          STR      r8,[sp,#0]
000018  f836301c          LDRH     r3,[r6,r12,LSL #1]
00001c  f835201c          LDRH     r2,[r5,r12,LSL #1]
000020  f8361014          LDRH     r1,[r6,r4,LSL #1]
000024  f8350014          LDRH     r0,[r5,r4,LSL #1]
000028  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLine
00002c  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;804
00002e  b284              UXTH     r4,r0                 ;804
                  |L25.48|
000030  1e78              SUBS     r0,r7,#1              ;804
000032  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;804
000034  dcec              BGT      |L25.16|
;;;807    	}
;;;808    }
000036  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;809    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawRect||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_DrawRect PROC
;;;820    */
;;;821    void LCD_DrawRect(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, uint16_t _usHeight, uint16_t _usWidth, uint16_t _usColor)
000000  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;822    {
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4615              MOV      r5,r2
00000a  4698              MOV      r8,r3
00000c  9c08              LDR      r4,[sp,#0x20]
;;;823    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000e  4811              LDR      r0,|L26.84|
000010  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000012  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000014  d107              BNE      |L26.38|
;;;824    	{
;;;825    		RA8875_DrawRect(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _usColor);
000016  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000018  462a              MOV      r2,r5
00001a  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00001c  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00001e  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
000020  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_DrawRect
000024  e014              B        |L26.80|
                  |L26.38|
;;;826    	}
;;;827    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
000026  480b              LDR      r0,|L26.84|
000028  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00002a  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
00002e  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
000030  d107              BNE      |L26.66|
;;;828    	{
;;;829    		ILI9488_DrawRect(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _usColor);
000032  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000034  462a              MOV      r2,r5
000036  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000038  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00003a  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
00003c  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_DrawRect
000040  e006              B        |L26.80|
                  |L26.66|
;;;830    	}
;;;831    	else
;;;832    	{
;;;833    		SPFD5420_DrawRect(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _usColor);
000042  b2ea              UXTB     r2,r5
000044  4643              MOV      r3,r8
000046  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000048  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00004a  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawRect
                  |L26.80|
;;;834    	}
;;;835    }
000050  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;836    
                          ENDP

                  |L26.84|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_DrawWin||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_DrawWin PROC
;;;929    */
;;;930    void LCD_DrawWin(WIN_T *_pWin)
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;931    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;932    #if 1
;;;933    	uint16_t TitleHegiht;
;;;934    
;;;935    	TitleHegiht = 20;
000004  2514              MOVS     r5,#0x14
;;;936    
;;;937    	/* 绘制窗口外框 */
;;;938    	LCD_DrawRect(_pWin->Left, _pWin->Top, _pWin->Height, _pWin->Width, WIN_BORDER_COLOR);
000006  f44f7004          MOV      r0,#0x210
00000a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00000c  8923              LDRH     r3,[r4,#8]
00000e  88e2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#6]
000010  88a1              LDRH     r1,[r4,#4]
000012  8860              LDRH     r0,[r4,#2]
000014  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;939    	LCD_DrawRect(_pWin->Left + 1, _pWin->Top + 1, _pWin->Height - 2, _pWin->Width - 2, WIN_BORDER_COLOR);
000018  f44f7004          MOV      r0,#0x210
00001c  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00001e  8926              LDRH     r6,[r4,#8]
000020  1eb6              SUBS     r6,r6,#2
000022  b2b3              UXTH     r3,r6
000024  88e6              LDRH     r6,[r4,#6]
000026  1eb6              SUBS     r6,r6,#2
000028  b2b2              UXTH     r2,r6
00002a  88a6              LDRH     r6,[r4,#4]
00002c  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1
00002e  b2b1              UXTH     r1,r6
000030  8866              LDRH     r6,[r4,#2]
000032  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1
000034  b2b0              UXTH     r0,r6
000036  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawRect
;;;940    
;;;941    	/* 窗口标题栏 */
;;;942    	LCD_Fill_Rect(_pWin->Left + 2, _pWin->Top + 2, TitleHegiht, _pWin->Width - 4, WIN_TITLE_COLOR);
00003a  f244203f          MOV      r0,#0x423f
00003e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000040  8922              LDRH     r2,[r4,#8]
000042  1f12              SUBS     r2,r2,#4
000044  b293              UXTH     r3,r2
000046  88a2              LDRH     r2,[r4,#4]
000048  1c92              ADDS     r2,r2,#2
00004a  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
00004c  8862              LDRH     r2,[r4,#2]
00004e  1c92              ADDS     r2,r2,#2
000050  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
000052  462a              MOV      r2,r5
000054  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;943    
;;;944    	/* 窗体填充 */
;;;945    	LCD_Fill_Rect(_pWin->Left + 2, _pWin->Top + TitleHegiht + 2, _pWin->Height - 4 - TitleHegiht,
000058  f24b50b6          MOV      r0,#0xb5b6
00005c  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00005e  8926              LDRH     r6,[r4,#8]
000060  1f36              SUBS     r6,r6,#4
000062  b2b3              UXTH     r3,r6
000064  88e6              LDRH     r6,[r4,#6]
000066  1f36              SUBS     r6,r6,#4
000068  1b76              SUBS     r6,r6,r5
00006a  b2b2              UXTH     r2,r6
00006c  88a6              LDRH     r6,[r4,#4]
00006e  442e              ADD      r6,r6,r5
000070  1cb6              ADDS     r6,r6,#2
000072  b2b1              UXTH     r1,r6
000074  8866              LDRH     r6,[r4,#2]
000076  1cb6              ADDS     r6,r6,#2
000078  b2b0              UXTH     r0,r6
00007a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;946    		_pWin->Width - 4, WIN_BODY_COLOR);
;;;947    
;;;948    	LCD_DispStr(_pWin->Left + 3, _pWin->Top + 2, _pWin->pCaption, _pWin->Font);
00007e  88a6              LDRH     r6,[r4,#4]
000080  1cb6              ADDS     r6,r6,#2
000082  b2b1              UXTH     r1,r6
000084  8866              LDRH     r6,[r4,#2]
000086  1cf6              ADDS     r6,r6,#3
000088  b2b0              UXTH     r0,r6
00008a  e9d43203          LDRD     r3,r2,[r4,#0xc]
00008e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;949    #else
;;;950    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
;;;951    	{
;;;952    		uint16_t TitleHegiht;
;;;953    
;;;954    		TitleHegiht = 28;
;;;955    
;;;956    		/* 绘制窗口外框 */
;;;957    		RA8875_DrawRect(_pWin->Left, _pWin->Top, _pWin->Height, _pWin->Width, WIN_BORDER_COLOR);
;;;958    		RA8875_DrawRect(_pWin->Left + 1, _pWin->Top + 1, _pWin->Height - 2, _pWin->Width - 2, WIN_BORDER_COLOR);
;;;959    
;;;960    		/* 窗口标题栏 */
;;;961    		RA8875_FillRect(_pWin->Left + 2, _pWin->Top + 2, TitleHegiht, _pWin->Width - 4, WIN_TITLE_COLOR);
;;;962    
;;;963    		/* 窗体填充 */
;;;964    		RA8875_FillRect(_pWin->Left + 2, _pWin->Top + TitleHegiht + 2, _pWin->Height - 4 - TitleHegiht, _pWin->Width - 4, WIN_BODY_COLOR);
;;;965    
;;;966    		//RA8875_SetFont(_pWin->Font.FontCode, 0, 0);
;;;967    		RA8875_SetFont(RA_FONT_24, 0, 0);
;;;968    
;;;969    		RA8875_SetBackColor(WIN_TITLE_COLOR);
;;;970    		RA8875_SetFrontColor(WIN_CAPTION_COLOR);
;;;971    		RA8875_DispStr(_pWin->Left + 3, _pWin->Top + 2, _pWin->Caption);
;;;972    	}
;;;973    	else
;;;974    	{
;;;975    		;
;;;976    	}
;;;977    #endif
;;;978    }
000092  bdf8              POP      {r3-r7,pc}
;;;979    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_FSMCConfig||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_FSMCConfig PROC
;;;1793   */
;;;1794   static void LCD_FSMCConfig(void)
000000  b500              PUSH     {lr}
;;;1795   {
000002  b09f              SUB      sp,sp,#0x7c
;;;1796   	FMC_NORSRAMInitTypeDef  init;
;;;1797   	FMC_NORSRAMTimingInitTypeDef  timingWrite;
;;;1798   	FMC_NORSRAMTimingInitTypeDef  timingRead;
;;;1799   
;;;1800   	/*-- FSMC Configuration ------------------------------------------------------*/
;;;1801   	/*----------------------- SRAM Bank 4 ----------------------------------------*/
;;;1802   	/* FSMC_Bank1_NORSRAM4 configuration */
;;;1803   	/* 摄像头DMA麻点，需设置 4 0 5 2 0 0 */
;;;1804   	timingWrite.FMC_AddressSetupTime = 4;
000004  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
000006  9008              STR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
;;;1805   	timingWrite.FMC_AddressHoldTime = 0;
000008  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00000a  9009              STR      r0,[sp,#0x24]
;;;1806   	timingWrite.FMC_DataSetupTime = 6;
00000c  2006              MOVS     r0,#6
00000e  900a              STR      r0,[sp,#0x28]
;;;1807   	timingWrite.FMC_BusTurnAroundDuration = 1;
000010  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000012  900b              STR      r0,[sp,#0x2c]
;;;1808   	timingWrite.FMC_CLKDivision = 0;
000014  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000016  900c              STR      r0,[sp,#0x30]
;;;1809   	timingWrite.FMC_DataLatency = 0;
000018  900d              STR      r0,[sp,#0x34]
;;;1810   	timingWrite.FMC_AccessMode = FMC_AccessMode_A;
00001a  900e              STR      r0,[sp,#0x38]
;;;1811   
;;;1812   	timingRead.FMC_AddressSetupTime = 4;
00001c  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
00001e  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
;;;1813   	timingRead.FMC_AddressHoldTime = 0;
000020  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000022  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
;;;1814   	timingRead.FMC_DataSetupTime = 8;
000024  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
000026  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1815   	timingRead.FMC_BusTurnAroundDuration = 1;
000028  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00002a  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;1816   	timingRead.FMC_CLKDivision = 0;
00002c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00002e  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;1817   	timingRead.FMC_DataLatency = 0;
000030  9006              STR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
;;;1818   	timingRead.FMC_AccessMode = FMC_AccessMode_A;
000032  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
;;;1819   
;;;1820   
;;;1821   	/*
;;;1822   	 LCD configured as follow:
;;;1823   	    - Data/Address MUX = Disable
;;;1824   	    - Memory Type = SRAM
;;;1825   	    - Data Width = 16bit
;;;1826   	    - Write Operation = Enable
;;;1827   	    - Extended Mode = Enable
;;;1828   	    - Asynchronous Wait = Disable
;;;1829   	*/
;;;1830   	init.FMC_Bank = FMC_Bank1_NORSRAM4;
000034  2006              MOVS     r0,#6
000036  900f              STR      r0,[sp,#0x3c]
;;;1831   	init.FMC_DataAddressMux = FMC_DataAddressMux_Disable;
000038  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00003a  9010              STR      r0,[sp,#0x40]
;;;1832   	init.FMC_MemoryType = FMC_MemoryType_SRAM;
00003c  9011              STR      r0,[sp,#0x44]
;;;1833   	init.FMC_MemoryDataWidth = FMC_NORSRAM_MemoryDataWidth_16b;
00003e  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000040  9012              STR      r0,[sp,#0x48]
;;;1834   	init.FMC_BurstAccessMode = FMC_BurstAccessMode_Disable;
000042  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000044  9013              STR      r0,[sp,#0x4c]
;;;1835   	init.FMC_AsynchronousWait = FMC_AsynchronousWait_Disable;	/* 注意旧库无这个成员 */
000046  901a              STR      r0,[sp,#0x68]
;;;1836   	init.FMC_WaitSignalPolarity = FMC_WaitSignalPolarity_Low;
000048  9014              STR      r0,[sp,#0x50]
;;;1837   	init.FMC_WrapMode = FMC_WrapMode_Disable;
00004a  9015              STR      r0,[sp,#0x54]
;;;1838   	init.FMC_WaitSignalActive = FMC_WaitSignalActive_BeforeWaitState;
00004c  9016              STR      r0,[sp,#0x58]
;;;1839   	init.FMC_WriteOperation = FMC_WriteOperation_Enable;
00004e  f44f5080          MOV      r0,#0x1000
000052  9017              STR      r0,[sp,#0x5c]
;;;1840   	init.FMC_WaitSignal = FMC_WaitSignal_Disable;
000054  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000056  9018              STR      r0,[sp,#0x60]
;;;1841   	init.FMC_ExtendedMode = FMC_ExtendedMode_Disable;
000058  9019              STR      r0,[sp,#0x64]
;;;1842   	init.FMC_WriteBurst = FMC_WriteBurst_Disable;
00005a  901b              STR      r0,[sp,#0x6c]
;;;1843   
;;;1844   	init.FMC_ReadWriteTimingStruct = &timingRead;
00005c  a801              ADD      r0,sp,#4
00005e  901d              STR      r0,[sp,#0x74]
;;;1845   	init.FMC_WriteTimingStruct = &timingWrite;
000060  a808              ADD      r0,sp,#0x20
000062  901e              STR      r0,[sp,#0x78]
;;;1846   
;;;1847   	FMC_NORSRAMInit(&init);
000064  a80f              ADD      r0,sp,#0x3c
000066  f7fffffe          BL       FMC_NORSRAMInit
;;;1848   
;;;1849   	/* - BANK 1 (of NOR/SRAM Bank 1~4) is enabled */
;;;1850   	FMC_NORSRAMCmd(FMC_Bank1_NORSRAM4, ENABLE);
00006a  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00006c  2006              MOVS     r0,#6
00006e  f7fffffe          BL       FMC_NORSRAMCmd
;;;1851   }
000072  b01f              ADD      sp,sp,#0x7c
000074  bd00              POP      {pc}
;;;1852   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_Fill_Rect||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_Fill_Rect PROC
;;;847    */
;;;848    void LCD_Fill_Rect(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, uint16_t _usHeight, uint16_t _usWidth, uint16_t _usColor)
000000  e92d43f8          PUSH     {r3-r9,lr}
;;;849    {
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4690              MOV      r8,r2
00000a  4699              MOV      r9,r3
00000c  9c08              LDR      r4,[sp,#0x20]
;;;850    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
00000e  4816              LDR      r0,|L29.104|
000010  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000012  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
000014  d107              BNE      |L29.38|
;;;851    	{
;;;852    		RA8875_FillRect(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _usColor);
000016  464b              MOV      r3,r9
000018  4642              MOV      r2,r8
00001a  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00001c  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00001e  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
000020  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_FillRect
000024  e01d              B        |L29.98|
                  |L29.38|
;;;853    	}
;;;854    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
000026  4810              LDR      r0,|L29.104|
000028  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00002a  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
00002e  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
000030  d107              BNE      |L29.66|
;;;855    	{
;;;856    		ILI9488_FillRect(_usX, _usY, _usHeight, _usWidth, _usColor);
000032  464b              MOV      r3,r9
000034  4642              MOV      r2,r8
000036  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000038  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00003a  9400              STR      r4,[sp,#0]
00003c  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_FillRect
000040  e00f              B        |L29.98|
                  |L29.66|
;;;857    	}
;;;858    	else
;;;859    	{
;;;860    		uint32_t i;
;;;861    		for (i = 0; i < _usHeight; i++)
000042  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
000044  e00a              B        |L29.92|
                  |L29.70|
;;;862    		{
;;;863    			SPFD5420_DrawHLine(_usX, _usY + i, _usX + _usWidth - 1, _usColor);
000046  eb060009          ADD      r0,r6,r9
00004a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00004c  b282              UXTH     r2,r0
00004e  1978              ADDS     r0,r7,r5
000050  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
000052  4623              MOV      r3,r4
000054  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000056  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_DrawHLine
00005a  1c6d              ADDS     r5,r5,#1              ;861
                  |L29.92|
00005c  4545              CMP      r5,r8                 ;861
00005e  d3f2              BCC      |L29.70|
;;;864    		}
;;;865    	}
000060  bf00              NOP      
                  |L29.98|
;;;866    }
000062  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;867    
                          ENDP

000066  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L29.104|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetBackLight||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_GetBackLight PROC
;;;1992   */
;;;1993   uint8_t LCD_GetBackLight(void)
000000  4801              LDR      r0,|L30.8|
;;;1994   {
;;;1995   	return s_ucBright;
000002  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_ucBright
;;;1996   }
000004  4770              BX       lr
;;;1997   /*
                          ENDP

000006  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L30.8|
                          DCD      s_ucBright

                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetChipDescribe||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_GetChipDescribe PROC
;;;108    */
;;;109    void LCD_GetChipDescribe(char *_str)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;110    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;111    	switch (g_ChipID)
000004  481b              LDR      r0,|L31.116|
000006  8801              LDRH     r1,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000008  f2454220          MOV      r2,#0x5420
00000c  1a88              SUBS     r0,r1,r2
00000e  4291              CMP      r1,r2
000010  d010              BEQ      |L31.52|
000012  dc06              BGT      |L31.34|
000014  2975              CMP      r1,#0x75
000016  d01c              BEQ      |L31.82|
000018  f46f4080          MVN      r0,#0x4000
00001c  1808              ADDS     r0,r1,r0
00001e  d122              BNE      |L31.102|
000020  e00d              B        |L31.62|
                  |L31.34|
000022  f5a04080          SUB      r0,r0,#0x4000
000026  3868              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x68
000028  d018              BEQ      |L31.92|
00002a  f46f5102          MVN      r1,#0x2080
00002e  1840              ADDS     r0,r0,r1
000030  d119              BNE      |L31.102|
000032  e009              B        |L31.72|
                  |L31.52|
;;;112    	{
;;;113    		case IC_5420:
;;;114    			strcpy(_str, CHIP_STR_5420);
000034  a110              ADR      r1,|L31.120|
000036  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000038  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;115    			break;
00003c  e018              B        |L31.112|
                  |L31.62|
;;;116    
;;;117    		case IC_4001:
;;;118    			strcpy(_str, CHIP_STR_4001);
00003e  a111              ADR      r1,|L31.132|
000040  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000042  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;119    			break;
000046  e013              B        |L31.112|
                  |L31.72|
;;;120    
;;;121    		case IC_61509:
;;;122    			strcpy(_str, CHIP_STR_61509);
000048  a111              ADR      r1,|L31.144|
00004a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;123    			break;
000050  e00e              B        |L31.112|
                  |L31.82|
;;;124    
;;;125    		case IC_8875:
;;;126    			strcpy(_str, CHIP_STR_8875);
000052  a111              ADR      r1,|L31.152|
000054  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000056  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;127    			break;
00005a  e009              B        |L31.112|
                  |L31.92|
;;;128    
;;;129    		case IC_9488:
;;;130    			strcpy(_str, CHIP_STR_9488);
00005c  a110              ADR      r1,|L31.160|
00005e  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000060  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;131    			break;
000064  e004              B        |L31.112|
                  |L31.102|
;;;132    
;;;133    		default:
;;;134    			strcpy(_str, "Unknow");
000066  a110              ADR      r1,|L31.168|
000068  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00006a  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;135    			break;
00006e  bf00              NOP      
                  |L31.112|
000070  bf00              NOP                            ;115
;;;136    	}
;;;137    }
000072  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;138    
                          ENDP

                  |L31.116|
                          DCD      g_ChipID
                  |L31.120|
000078  53504644          DCB      "SPFD5420A",0
00007c  35343230
000080  4100    
000082  00                DCB      0
000083  00                DCB      0
                  |L31.132|
000084  4f544d34          DCB      "OTM4001A",0
000088  30303141
00008c  00      
00008d  00                DCB      0
00008e  00                DCB      0
00008f  00                DCB      0
                  |L31.144|
000090  52363135          DCB      "R61509V",0
000094  30395600
                  |L31.152|
000098  52413838          DCB      "RA8875",0
00009c  373500  
00009f  00                DCB      0
                  |L31.160|
0000a0  494c4939          DCB      "ILI9488",0
0000a4  34383800
                  |L31.168|
0000a8  556e6b6e          DCB      "Unknow",0
0000ac  6f7700  
0000af  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetFontHeight||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_GetFontHeight PROC
;;;460    */
;;;461    uint16_t LCD_GetFontHeight(FONT_T *_tFont)
000000  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;462    {
;;;463    	uint16_t height;
;;;464    
;;;465    	/* 如果字体结构为空指针，则缺省按16点阵 */
;;;466    	if (_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_12)
000002  880a              LDRH     r2,[r1,#0]
000004  2a01              CMP      r2,#1
000006  d101              BNE      |L32.12|
;;;467    	{
;;;468    		height = 12;
000008  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
00000a  e000              B        |L32.14|
                  |L32.12|
;;;469    	}
;;;470    	else
;;;471    	{
;;;472    		height = 16;
00000c  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
                  |L32.14|
;;;473    	}
;;;474    
;;;475    	return height;
;;;476    }
00000e  4770              BX       lr
;;;477    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetFontWidth||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_GetFontWidth PROC
;;;434    */
;;;435    uint16_t LCD_GetFontWidth(FONT_T *_tFont)
000000  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;436    {
;;;437    	uint16_t font_width;
;;;438    
;;;439    	/* 如果字体结构为空指针，则缺省按16点阵 */
;;;440    	if (_tFont->FontCode == FC_ST_12)
000002  880a              LDRH     r2,[r1,#0]
000004  2a01              CMP      r2,#1
000006  d101              BNE      |L33.12|
;;;441    	{
;;;442    		font_width = 12;
000008  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
00000a  e000              B        |L33.14|
                  |L33.12|
;;;443    	}
;;;444    	else
;;;445    	{
;;;446    		font_width = 16;
00000c  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
                  |L33.14|
;;;447    	}
;;;448    
;;;449    	return font_width;
;;;450    }
00000e  4770              BX       lr
;;;451    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetHeight||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_GetHeight PROC
;;;146    */
;;;147    uint16_t LCD_GetHeight(void)
000000  4801              LDR      r0,|L34.8|
;;;148    {
;;;149    	return g_LcdHeight;
000002  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_LcdHeight
;;;150    }
000004  4770              BX       lr
;;;151    
                          ENDP

000006  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L34.8|
                          DCD      g_LcdHeight

                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetPixel||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_GetPixel PROC
;;;742    */
;;;743    uint16_t LCD_GetPixel(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;744    {
000002  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000004  460e              MOV      r6,r1
;;;745    	uint16_t usRGB;
;;;746    
;;;747    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
000006  480e              LDR      r0,|L35.64|
000008  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00000a  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
00000c  d105              BNE      |L35.26|
;;;748    	{
;;;749    		usRGB = RA8875_GetPixel(_usX, _usY);
00000e  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000010  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000012  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_GetPixel
000016  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000018  e010              B        |L35.60|
                  |L35.26|
;;;750    	}
;;;751    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
00001a  4809              LDR      r0,|L35.64|
00001c  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00001e  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
000022  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
000024  d105              BNE      |L35.50|
;;;752    	{
;;;753    		usRGB = ILI9488_GetPixel(_usX, _usY);
000026  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000028  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_GetPixel
00002e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000030  e004              B        |L35.60|
                  |L35.50|
;;;754    	}
;;;755    	else
;;;756    	{
;;;757    		usRGB = SPFD5420_GetPixel(_usX, _usY);
000032  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000034  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000036  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_GetPixel
00003a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
                  |L35.60|
;;;758    	}
;;;759    
;;;760    	return usRGB;
00003c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
;;;761    }
00003e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;762    
                          ENDP

                  |L35.64|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetStrWidth||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_GetStrWidth PROC
;;;487    */
;;;488    uint16_t LCD_GetStrWidth(char *_ptr, FONT_T *_tFont)
000000  e92d43f0          PUSH     {r4-r9,lr}
;;;489    {
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
;;;490    	char *p = _ptr;
000008  4633              MOV      r3,r6
;;;491    	uint16_t width = 0;
00000a  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;492    	uint8_t code1, code2;
;;;493    	uint16_t font_width;
;;;494    
;;;495    	font_width = LCD_GetFontWidth(_tFont);
00000c  4638              MOV      r0,r7
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_GetFontWidth
000012  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;496    
;;;497    	while (*p != 0)
000014  e016              B        |L36.68|
                  |L36.22|
;;;498    	{
;;;499    		code1 = *p;	/* 读取字符串数据， 该数据可能是ascii代码，也可能汉字代码的高字节 */
000016  f8939000          LDRB     r9,[r3,#0]
;;;500    		if (code1 < 0x80)	/* ASCII */
00001a  f1b90f80          CMP      r9,#0x80
00001e  da06              BGE      |L36.46|
;;;501    		{
;;;502    			width += font_width / 2;
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  eb0571d0          ADD      r1,r5,r0,LSR #31
000026  eb040161          ADD      r1,r4,r1,ASR #1
00002a  b28c              UXTH     r4,r1
00002c  e009              B        |L36.66|
                  |L36.46|
;;;503    		}
;;;504    		else	/* 汉字 */
;;;505    		{
;;;506    			code2 = *++p;
00002e  1c58              ADDS     r0,r3,#1
000030  4603              MOV      r3,r0
000032  f8908000          LDRB     r8,[r0,#0]
;;;507    			if (code2 == 0)
000036  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0
00003a  d100              BNE      |L36.62|
;;;508    			{
;;;509    				break;
00003c  e005              B        |L36.74|
                  |L36.62|
;;;510    			}
;;;511    			width += font_width;
00003e  1960              ADDS     r0,r4,r5
000040  b284              UXTH     r4,r0
                  |L36.66|
;;;512    		}
;;;513    		p++;
000042  1c5b              ADDS     r3,r3,#1
                  |L36.68|
000044  7818              LDRB     r0,[r3,#0]            ;497
000046  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;497
000048  d1e5              BNE      |L36.22|
                  |L36.74|
00004a  bf00              NOP                            ;509
;;;514    	}
;;;515    
;;;516    	return width;
00004c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
;;;517    }
00004e  e8bd83f0          POP      {r4-r9,pc}
;;;518    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.LCD_GetWidth||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_GetWidth PROC
;;;159    */
;;;160    uint16_t LCD_GetWidth(void)
000000  4801              LDR      r0,|L37.8|
;;;161    {
;;;162    	return g_LcdWidth;
000002  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_LcdWidth
;;;163    }
000004  4770              BX       lr
;;;164    
                          ENDP

000006  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L37.8|
                          DCD      g_LcdWidth

                          AREA ||i.LCD_InitHard||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_InitHard PROC
;;;59     */
;;;60     void LCD_InitHard(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;61     {
;;;62     	uint32_t id;
;;;63     
;;;64     	/* 配置LCD控制口线GPIO */
;;;65     	LCD_CtrlLinesConfig();
000002  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_CtrlLinesConfig
;;;66     
;;;67     	/* 配置FSMC接口，数据总线 */
;;;68     	LCD_FSMCConfig();
000006  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_FSMCConfig
;;;69     
;;;70     	/* FSMC重置后必须加延迟才能访问总线设备  */
;;;71     	bsp_DelayMS(20);
00000a  2014              MOVS     r0,#0x14
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_DelayMS
;;;72     
;;;73     	id = ILI9488_ReadID();
000010  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_ReadID
000014  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;74     	if (id == 0x548066)		/* 3.5寸屏 */
000016  f5a400a9          SUB      r0,r4,#0x548000
00001a  3866              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x66
00001c  d106              BNE      |L38.44|
;;;75     	{
;;;76     		g_ChipID = IC_9488;
00001e  f2494088          MOV      r0,#0x9488
000022  4913              LDR      r1,|L38.112|
000024  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;77     		ILI9488_InitHard();
000026  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_InitHard
00002a  e016              B        |L38.90|
                  |L38.44|
;;;78     	}
;;;79     	else
;;;80     	{
;;;81     		id = SPFD5420_ReadID();  	/* 读取LCD驱动芯片ID */
00002c  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_ReadID
000030  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;82     		if ((id == 0x5420) || (id ==  0xB509) || (id == 0x5520))
000032  f5a440a8          SUB      r0,r4,#0x5400
000036  3820              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x20
000038  d007              BEQ      |L38.74|
00003a  f5a44035          SUB      r0,r4,#0xb500
00003e  3809              SUBS     r0,r0,#9
000040  d003              BEQ      |L38.74|
000042  f5a440aa          SUB      r0,r4,#0x5500
000046  3820              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x20
000048  d102              BNE      |L38.80|
                  |L38.74|
;;;83     		{
;;;84     			SPFD5420_InitHard();	/* 初始化5420和4001屏硬件 */
00004a  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_InitHard
00004e  e004              B        |L38.90|
                  |L38.80|
;;;85     			/* g_ChipID 在函数内部设置了 */
;;;86     		}
;;;87     		else
;;;88     		{
;;;89     			g_ChipID = IC_8875;
000050  2075              MOVS     r0,#0x75
000052  4907              LDR      r1,|L38.112|
000054  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;90     			RA8875_InitHard();	/* 初始化RA8875芯片 */
000056  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_InitHard
                  |L38.90|
;;;91     		}
;;;92     	}
;;;93     
;;;94     	LCD_SetDirection(0);
00005a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00005c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetDirection
;;;95     
;;;96     	LCD_ClrScr(CL_BLACK);	/* 清屏，显示全黑 */
000060  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000062  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ClrScr
;;;97     	LCD_SetBackLight(BRIGHT_MAX);	 /* 打开背光，设置为缺省亮度 */
000066  20ff              MOVS     r0,#0xff
000068  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetBackLight
;;;98     }
00006c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;99     
                          ENDP

00006e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L38.112|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_PutPixel||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_PutPixel PROC
;;;716    */
;;;717    void LCD_PutPixel(uint16_t _usX, uint16_t _usY, uint16_t _usColor)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;718    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000006  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;719    	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
000008  480d              LDR      r0,|L39.64|
00000a  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00000c  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
00000e  d105              BNE      |L39.28|
;;;720    	{
;;;721    		RA8875_PutPixel(_usX, _usY, _usColor);
000010  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000012  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000014  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000016  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_PutPixel
00001a  e010              B        |L39.62|
                  |L39.28|
;;;722    	}
;;;723    	else if (g_ChipID == IC_9488)
00001c  4808              LDR      r0,|L39.64|
00001e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
000020  f5a04114          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9400
000024  3988              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x88
000026  d105              BNE      |L39.52|
;;;724    	{
;;;725    		ILI9488_PutPixel(_usX, _usY, _usColor);
000028  4632              MOV      r2,r6
00002a  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00002c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_PutPixel
000032  e004              B        |L39.62|
                  |L39.52|
;;;726    	}
;;;727    	else
;;;728    	{
;;;729    		SPFD5420_PutPixel(_usX, _usY, _usColor);
000034  4632              MOV      r2,r6
000036  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000038  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       SPFD5420_PutPixel
                  |L39.62|
;;;730    	}
;;;731    }
00003e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;732    
                          ENDP

                  |L39.64|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_SetBackLight||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_SetBackLight PROC
;;;1970   */
;;;1971   void LCD_SetBackLight(uint8_t _bright)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1972   {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1973   	s_ucBright =  _bright;	/* 保存背光值 */
000004  4806              LDR      r0,|L40.32|
000006  7004              STRB     r4,[r0,#0]
;;;1974   
;;;1975   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
000008  4806              LDR      r0,|L40.36|
00000a  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00000c  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
00000e  d103              BNE      |L40.24|
;;;1976   	{
;;;1977   		RA8875_SetBackLight(_bright);
000010  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000012  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_SetBackLight
000016  e002              B        |L40.30|
                  |L40.24|
;;;1978   	}
;;;1979   	else
;;;1980   	{
;;;1981   		LCD_SetPwmBackLight(_bright);
000018  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetPwmBackLight
                  |L40.30|
;;;1982   	}
;;;1983   }
00001e  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1984   
                          ENDP

                  |L40.32|
                          DCD      s_ucBright
                  |L40.36|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_SetDirection||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_SetDirection PROC
;;;2004   */
;;;2005   void LCD_SetDirection(uint8_t _dir)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;2006   {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;2007   	g_LcdDirection =  _dir;		/* 保存在全局变量 */
000004  4806              LDR      r0,|L41.32|
000006  7004              STRB     r4,[r0,#0]
;;;2008   
;;;2009   	if (g_ChipID == IC_8875)
000008  4806              LDR      r0,|L41.36|
00000a  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; g_ChipID
00000c  2875              CMP      r0,#0x75
00000e  d103              BNE      |L41.24|
;;;2010   	{
;;;2011   		RA8875_SetDirection(_dir);
000010  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000012  f7fffffe          BL       RA8875_SetDirection
000016  e002              B        |L41.30|
                  |L41.24|
;;;2012   	}
;;;2013   	else
;;;2014   	{
;;;2015   		ILI9488_SetDirection(_dir);
000018  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001a  f7fffffe          BL       ILI9488_SetDirection
                  |L41.30|
;;;2016   	}
;;;2017   }
00001e  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;2018   
                          ENDP

                  |L41.32|
                          DCD      g_LcdDirection
                  |L41.36|
                          DCD      g_ChipID

                          AREA ||i.LCD_SetPwmBackLight||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  LCD_SetPwmBackLight PROC
;;;1862   */
;;;1863   void LCD_SetPwmBackLight(uint8_t _bright)
000000  b57c              PUSH     {r2-r6,lr}
;;;1864   {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1865   	#if 1
;;;1866   
;;;1867   	bsp_SetTIMOutPWM(GPIOF, GPIO_Pin_6, TIM10, 1, 100, (_bright * 10000) /255);
000004  f2427010          MOV      r0,#0x2710
000008  4360              MULS     r0,r4,r0
00000a  21ff              MOVS     r1,#0xff
00000c  fb90f5f1          SDIV     r5,r0,r1
000010  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
000012  2301              MOVS     r3,#1
000014  4a03              LDR      r2,|L42.36|
000016  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
000018  e9cd0500          STRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0]
00001c  4802              LDR      r0,|L42.40|
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_SetTIMOutPWM
;;;1868   	#else
;;;1869   	/* STM32-V5 使用PF6 / TIM10_CH1 输出PWM, */
;;;1870   	GPIO_InitTypeDef GPIO_InitStructure;
;;;1871   	TIM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef  TIM_TimeBaseStructure;
;;;1872   	TIM_OCInitTypeDef  TIM_OCInitStructure;
;;;1873   
;;;1874   	/* 第1步：打开GPIO 时钟	*/
;;;1875   	RCC_AHB1PeriphClockCmd(RCC_AHB1Periph_GPIOF, ENABLE);
;;;1876   
;;;1877   	if (_bright == 0)
;;;1878   	{
;;;1879   		/* 配置背光GPIO为输入模式 */
;;;1880   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Pin = GPIO_Pin_6;
;;;1881   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Mode = GPIO_Mode_IN;
;;;1882   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Speed = GPIO_Speed_100MHz;
;;;1883   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_OType = GPIO_OType_PP;
;;;1884   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_PuPd  = GPIO_PuPd_NOPULL;
;;;1885   
;;;1886   		GPIO_Init(GPIOF, &GPIO_InitStructure);
;;;1887   
;;;1888   		/* 关闭TIM10 */
;;;1889   		TIM_Cmd(TIM10, DISABLE);
;;;1890   		return;
;;;1891   	}
;;;1892   	else if (_bright == BRIGHT_MAX)	/* 最大亮度 */
;;;1893   	{
;;;1894   		/* 配置背光GPIO为推挽输出模式 */
;;;1895   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Pin = GPIO_Pin_6;
;;;1896   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Mode = GPIO_Mode_OUT;
;;;1897   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Speed = GPIO_Speed_100MHz;
;;;1898   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_OType = GPIO_OType_PP;
;;;1899   		GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_PuPd  = GPIO_PuPd_NOPULL;
;;;1900   
;;;1901   		GPIO_SetBits(GPIOF, GPIO_Pin_1);
;;;1902   
;;;1903   		/* 关闭TIM8 */
;;;1904   		TIM_Cmd(TIM8, DISABLE);
;;;1905   		return;
;;;1906   	}
;;;1907   
;;;1908   	/* 配置背光GPIO为复用推挽输出模式 */
;;;1909   	GPIO_PinAFConfig(GPIOF, GPIO_PinSource6, GPIO_AF_TIM10);
;;;1910   
;;;1911   	GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Mode = GPIO_Mode_AF;
;;;1912   	GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Speed = GPIO_Speed_100MHz;
;;;1913   	GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_OType = GPIO_OType_PP;
;;;1914   	GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_PuPd  = GPIO_PuPd_NOPULL;
;;;1915   
;;;1916   	/* 使能TIM10的时钟 */
;;;1917   	RCC_APB2PeriphClockCmd(RCC_APB2Periph_TIM10, ENABLE);
;;;1918   
;;;1919   	/*
;;;1920   		TIM3 配置: 产生1路PWM信号;
;;;1921   		TIM3CLK = 72 MHz, Prescaler = 0(不分频), TIM3 counter clock = 72 MHz
;;;1922   		计算公式：
;;;1923   		PWM输出频率 = TIM3 counter clock /(ARR + 1)
;;;1924   
;;;1925   		我们期望设置为100Hz
;;;1926   
;;;1927   		如果不对TIM3CLK预分频，那么不可能得到100Hz低频。
;;;1928   		我们设置分频比 = 1000， 那么  TIM3 counter clock = 72KHz
;;;1929   		TIM_Period = 720 - 1;
;;;1930   		频率下不来。
;;;1931   	 */
;;;1932   	TIM_TimeBaseStructure.TIM_Period = 720 - 1;	/* TIM_Period = TIM3 ARR Register */
;;;1933   	TIM_TimeBaseStructure.TIM_Prescaler = 0;
;;;1934   	TIM_TimeBaseStructure.TIM_ClockDivision = 0;
;;;1935   	TIM_TimeBaseStructure.TIM_CounterMode = TIM_CounterMode_Up;
;;;1936   
;;;1937   	TIM_TimeBaseInit(TIM10, &TIM_TimeBaseStructure);
;;;1938   
;;;1939   	/* PWM1 Mode configuration: Channel1 */
;;;1940   	TIM_OCInitStructure.TIM_OCMode = TIM_OCMode_PWM1;
;;;1941   	TIM_OCInitStructure.TIM_OutputState = TIM_OutputState_Enable;
;;;1942   	/*
;;;1943   		_bright = 1 时, TIM_Pulse = 1
;;;1944   		_bright = 255 时, TIM_Pulse = TIM_Period
;;;1945   	*/
;;;1946   	TIM_OCInitStructure.TIM_Pulse = (TIM_TimeBaseStructure.TIM_Period * _bright) / BRIGHT_MAX;	/* 改变占空比 */
;;;1947   
;;;1948   	TIM_OCInitStructure.TIM_OCPolarity = TIM_OCPolarity_High;
;;;1949   	TIM_OC1Init(TIM10, &TIM_OCInitStructure);
;;;1950   	TIM_OC1PreloadConfig(TIM10, TIM_OCPreload_Enable);
;;;1951   
;;;1952   	TIM_ARRPreloadConfig(TIM10, ENABLE);
;;;1953   
;;;1954   	/* 使能 TIM8 定时器 */
;;;1955   	TIM_Cmd(TIM10, ENABLE);
;;;1956   
;;;1957   	/* 下面这句话对于TIM1和TIM8是必须的，对于TIM2-TIM6则不必要 */
;;;1958   	//TIM_CtrlPWMOutputs(TIM10, ENABLE);
;;;1959   #endif
;;;1960   }
000022  bd7c              POP      {r2-r6,pc}
;;;1961   
                          ENDP

                  |L42.36|
                          DCD      0x40014400
                  |L42.40|
                          DCD      0x40021400

                          AREA ||.data||, DATA, ALIGN=1

                  g_ChipID
000000  4001              DCW      0x4001
                  g_LcdHeight
000002  00f0              DCW      0x00f0
                  g_LcdWidth
000004  0190              DCW      0x0190
                  s_ucBright
000006  00                DCB      0x00
                  g_LcdDirection
000007  00                DCB      0x00
                  font_width
000008  00                DCB      0x00
                  font_height
000009  00                DCB      0x00
                  width
00000a  0000              DCB      0x00,0x00
                  font_bytes
00000c  0000              DCB      0x00,0x00

;*** Start embedded assembler ***

	THUMB

#line 129 "F:\\keil\\ARM\\CMSIS\\Include\\core_cmInstr.h"
|__asm___13_bsp_tft_lcd_c_g_ChipID____REV16| PROC
#line 130

 rev16 r0, r0
 bx lr
	ENDP
	AREA ||.revsh_text||, CODE, READONLY
	THUMB
	EXPORT |__asm___13_bsp_tft_lcd_c_g_ChipID____REVSH|
#line 144
|__asm___13_bsp_tft_lcd_c_g_ChipID____REVSH| PROC
#line 145

 bx lr
	ENDP
